word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"letter-spacing: 0.544px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-align: center; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; font-family: 宋体; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; font-size: 18px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">医学检验实验室基本标准<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（试行）</span></strong></span></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; line-height: normal; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; font-family: 宋体; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">医学检验实验室指以提供人类疾病诊断、管理、预防和治疗或健康评估的相关信息为目的，对来自人体的标本进行临床检验，包括临床血液与体液检验、临床化学检验、临床免疫检验、临床微生物检验、临床细胞分子遗传学检验和临床病理检查等，并出具检验结果，具有独立法人资质的医疗机构。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	一、诊疗科目<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	医学检验科；提供病理相关医疗服务的，应当参照病理诊 断中心基本标准。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	二、科室设置<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	包括临床血液与体液检验专业、临床化学检验专业、临床免疫检验专业、临床微生物检验专业、临床细胞分子遗传学专业和临床病理专业等。有病案信息、试剂、质量和安全管理等专门部门或专职人员，以及辅助检查部门和消毒供应室（可以设置也可以委托其他医疗机构承担相应的服务）。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	三、人员<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）至少有1名具有副高级以上专业技术职称任职资格的临床类别执业医师。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）临床检验各专业至少有5名以上医学检验专业卫生技术人员，其中至少有1名具有副高以上、2名中级以上专业技术职称任职资格的技术人员。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）标本采集人员应当有相应资质。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（四）开展产前筛查与产前诊断项目的实验技术人员应具备产前筛查与诊断的相应资质。开展二代基因测序项目的，至少有1名生物信息分析专业技术人员；开展遗传相关基因检测项目的，至少有1名医学遗传学专业人员。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（五）配备质量安全管理人员；设置试剂室、辅助检查和消毒供应室的，应当配备相应的卫生专业技术人员。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（六）应当制定人员培训考核与继续教育的相关制度和实施记录。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	四、房屋和设施<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）医疗用房使用面积不少于总面积75%，房屋应当具备双路供电或应急发电设施，重要医疗设备和网络应有不间断电源。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）设置1个临床检验专业的，建筑面积不少于500 平方米；设置2个以上临床检验专业的，每增设1个专业建筑面积增加300平方米。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）有相应的工作区域，流程应当满足工作需要。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（四）设置医疗废物暂存处，设置污物和污水处理设施 和设备，满足污物和污水的消毒和无害化的要求。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	五、分区布局<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）主要业务功能区。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	设置包括临床血液与体液检验专业、临床化学检验专 业、临床免疫检验专业、临床微生物检验专业、临床细胞分 子遗传学专业和临床病理专业等业务功能区域。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	符合生物安全管理和医院感染管理等相关要求，严格区分清洁区、半污染区、污染区，生物安全设施齐备。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）辅助功能区。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	集中供电、供水以及消毒供应室和其他等。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）管理区。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	行政（人事、办公等）、采购、财务、质量保证、物流、 信息管理等部门。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	六、设备<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）基本设备。包括冰箱、离心机、加样器、压力蒸汽灭菌器、生物安全柜等基本设备，应当与所开展的检验项目和工作量相适应。所有检验设备，如生化类分析仪、血细胞分析仪、尿液分析仪、酶标仪、发光分析仪、细菌培养和鉴定仪、核酸类分析仪、质谱色谱分析仪等检验设备应符合国家食品药品监督管理总局公布的医疗器械管理相关要求。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）病理诊断设备。离心机、加样器、消毒设备、生物安全柜、标本柜、切片柜、蜡块柜、大体摄影装置、数字切片系统、光学显微镜等常规设备配置数量要与业务量相适应。至少有一台5人以上共览显微镜。配置相应数量的分子病理诊断和技术设备，如PCR室及相应设备、核酸提取设备、 分子杂交仪、低温离心机、荧光显微镜等。专业病理设备包 括密闭式全自动脱水机、蜡块包埋机、HE全自动染色机、摊片机、石蜡切片机、自动液基/薄层细胞制片设备、冰冻切片机（可选）、全自动免疫组化染色机等，专业病理设备需有&ldquo;国食药监械&rdquo;级别的医疗器械注册号。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）信息化设备。具备信息报送和传输功能的网络计 算机等设备，标本管理、报告管理等信息管理系统。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	七、规章制度<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	建立医学检验实验室质量管理体系，制定各项规章制度、人员岗位职责，实施由国家制定或认可的诊疗技术规范和操作规程。规章制度至少包括设施与设备管理制度、试剂管理制度、标本管理制度、分析前、中、后三个阶段的质量管理制度、患者（标本）登记和医疗文档管理制度、消防安全管理制度、信息管理制度与患者隐私保护制度、生物安全管理制度、危化品使用管理制度，并制定各检验项目的质量控制指标及标准操作程序。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	八、其他<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）建立医学检验实验室的单位或者个人必须符合《医疗机构管理条例》（中华人民共和国国务院令第149号）及其实施细则的相关规定。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）医学检验实验室属于单独设置的医疗机构，由省级卫生计生行政部门设置审批。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）医学检验实验室为独立法人单位，独立承担相应法律责任。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（四）严格执行《医疗机构临床实验室管理办法》，所开展检验项目应接受省级以上临床检验中心组织的室间质量评价，保证检验结果的科学性和准确性。对于尚无室间质量评价的项目，医学检验实验室应采取其他方案并提供客观证据确定检验结果的可接受性。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（五）委托其他医疗机构承担试剂、耗品、辅助检查和消毒供应物品的检验实验室应与相应医疗机构签署医疗服务合作协议，保障相应医疗服务的质量和及时性。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（六）《医学检验所基本标准》（卫医政发〔2009〕119号）在本标准颁布时废止。</span></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"letter-spacing: 0.544px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-align: center; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; font-family: 宋体; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; font-size: 18px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">独立医学检验实验室管理规范<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（试行）</span></strong></span></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-size: 12px; line-height: normal; font-family: 宋体; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; font-size: 16px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">为加强对医学检验实验室的管理工作，提高医学检验水平，保证医疗质量和医疗安全，根据《执业医师法》、《医疗机构管理条例》、《病原微生物实验室生物安全管理条例》、《医疗废物管理条例》、《医疗器械监督管理条例》及《医疗机构临床实验室管理办法》等有关法律、法规，制定本规范。本规范适用于独立设置的对人类血液、体液、组织标本开展临床检验的医疗机构，不包括医疗机构内设的医学检验科。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	一、机构管理<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）医学检验实验室应当制定并落实管理规章制度，执行国家制定颁布或者认可的技术规范和操作规程，明确工作人员岗位职责，落实医院感染预防和控制措施，保障临床检验工作安全、有效地开展。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）医学检验实验室应当设置独立实验室质量安全管理部门或配备专职人员，负责实验室质量管理与控制工作，履行以下职责：<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	1.对规章制度、技术规范、操作规程的落实情况进行检查；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	2.对医疗质量、医院感染管理、器械和设备管理、一次性医疗器具管理等方面进行检查；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	3.对重点环节，以及影响诊断质量和医疗安全的高危因素进行监测、分析和反馈，提出预防和控制措施；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	4.对工作人员的职业安全防护和健康管理提供指导；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	5.预防控制医学检验实验室的污染物外泄及医院感染；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	6.对医学检验实验室的诊断报告书写、保存进行指导和检查，对病理检查病例信息登记进行督查，并保障登记数据的真实性和及时性；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	7.对设置的试剂、仪器耗材、辅助检查和消毒供应部门进行指导和检查，并提出质量控制改进意见和措施。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）医学检验实验室质量安全管理人员应当具有中级以上专业技术职务任职资格，具备相关专业知识和工作经验。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（四）财务部门要对实验室业务费用和检验项目费用结算进行检查，并提出调控措施。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（五）后勤管理部门负责防火、防盗、医疗纠纷等安全工作。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	二、质量管理<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	医学检验实验室应当按照以下要求开展医疗质量管理工作：<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）应当以ISO15189：2012为质量管理的标准，建立并实施医学检验质量管理体系，遵守相关技术规范和标准，落实分析前、分析中、分析后三个阶段的质量管理制度、医学检验项目标准操作规程、检验仪器标准操作与维护规程，持续改进检验质量。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）可根据其他医疗机构和执业医师提出的检验申请，接收其提供的标本或者直接采集受检者相关标本，并向申请者提供检验报告。受检者的经治医师负责对检验结果最终解释，但必要时，医学检验实验室应当提供与检验结果相关的技术解释。具有分析前质量保证措施，制定患者准备、标本采集、标本储存、标本运送、标本接收等标准操作规程，并组织实施。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）加强对分析中的管理，规范医学检验活动，按照有关规定严格开展室内质量控制。按照安全、准确、及时、有效、经济、便民和保护患者隐私的原则开展检验工作，保证检验结果客观、公正，不受不当因素影响。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（四）开展分析后管理，采取有效措施保证检验活动的质量满足临床医疗的需求。应当对危急值、检验周转时间、检验结果准确性等质控指标进行监控。建立检测后标本、已发出报告标准的保留时限相关管理制度。制定报告召回的管理程序，建立检验需求超过自身服务能力的预案。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（五）参加省级及以上临床检验中心组织的室间质量评价活动。对于尚无室间质量评价的项目，应当采取其他方案并提供客观证据确定检验结果的可接受性，促进临床检验结果互认。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（六）医学检验技术人员应当具有相关的专业学历，并取得相应专业技术职务任职资格和执业资格。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（七）对需要检定或校准的检验仪器设备，以及对医学检验结果有影响的辅助设备定期进行检定或校准。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（八）建立满足服务质量要求的实验室信息系统，建立系统数据安全管理制度和应急措施。具备与所服务的机构信息系统联网的能力。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（九）建立医学检验报告发放制度，保证医学检验报告准确、及时和信息完整。不得出具虚假检验报告。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（十）医学检验报告应使用中文或者国际通用的、规范的缩写。保存期限按照有关规定执行。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（十一）医学检验报告或诊断报告内容应当符合《病历书写基本规范》等规定，至少应当包括：<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	1.检查单号、标本类型、临床诊断、检验方法、仪器型号、互认项目提示。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	2.患者姓名、性别、年龄、独立或其联锁经营医学检验实验室名称和地址、咨询电话。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	3.其他机构送检标本需注明送检机构名称、住院病历或者门诊病历号。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	4.检验项目、检验结果和计量单位、参考区间（如适用）、危急值（如适用）、异常结果提示。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	5.检验者姓名、审核者姓名、标本采集时间、接收时间、报告时间。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	6.其他需要报告的内容和备注信息，如必要时应报告与临床诊断相关重要信息。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（十二）医学检验实验室在与其他类别医疗机构等建立长期合作时，应当签订合同，明确双方在分析前、分析中和分析后以及检验结果所致医疗纠纷的责任、权利和义务。开展产前筛查与诊断的医学检验实验室只能与具有产前筛查与诊断资质的医疗机构开展合作。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（十三）对于连锁经营的医学检验实验室，在保证生物安全和检验质量的前提下，可以在其连锁经营的实验室之间进行标本的异地检测，并在检验报告中清晰标注实际检验实验室，便于出现差错时查找原因。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	三、安全与感染防控<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）医学检验实验室应当加强安全管理，强化医院感染预防与控制工作，建立并落实相关规章制度和工作规范，科学设置工作流程，降低发生医院感染的风险。保障检验服务的质量、安全，以及员工、患者和来访者的健康和安全。建立并严格遵守生物安全管理制度与安全操作规程。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）应当设专人负责标本在实验室内部，以及其他机构与实验室之间传递过程的生物安全工作，包括生物安全培训以及相关设备耗材的管理等。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）医学检验实验室开展基因扩增、艾滋病检测、产前筛查与诊断、胚胎植入前遗传学筛查与诊断等特殊检验项目，应当按照国家卫生计生委相关规定通过有关部门审核。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（四）医学检验实验室的建筑布局应当遵循环境卫生学和医院感染管理的原则，符合功能流程合理和洁污区域分开的基本要求，做到布局合理、分区明确、标识清楚。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（五）医学检验实验室应当划分为医学检验功能区、辅助功能区和管理区。医学检验功能区包括接诊及标本接收区、标本采集区、标本准备区、标本检验区、试剂和耗品保存区、标本保存区、医疗废物处理区和医务人员办公区等基本功能区域；辅助功能区包括医疗费用结算区、供电区、纯水集中供应区和消毒供应室等；管理区包括病案、信息、实验室质量控制与安全管理部门等。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（六）标本采样区域应当达到《医院消毒卫生标准》中规定Ⅱ类环境标准。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（七）严格按照《病原微生物实验室生物安全管理条例》有关规定，加强对传染性疾病标本的采集、运输、储存、检验相关管理。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（八）应当按照《医疗废物管理条例》和《医疗卫生机构医疗废物管理办法》相关规定妥善处理医疗废物。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（九）应当按照国家有关法规加强消防安全管理、信息安全管理。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	四、人员培训与职业安全防护<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）医学检验实验室应当制定并落实工作人员的岗前培训和轮岗培训计划，并进行考核，使工作人员具备与本职工作相关的专业知识，落实相关管理制度和工作规范。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）医学检验实验室应当对工作人员进行上岗前安全教育，每年进行生物安全防护知识培训。制定生物安全事故和危险品、危险设施等意外事故的预防措施和应急预案。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）医学检验实验室应当建立对技术人员的专业知识更新、专业技能维持与持续培养等管理的相关制度和记录。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（四）独立医学检验实验室应当按照生物防护级别配备必要的安全设备和个人防护用品，保证实验室工作人员能够正确使用。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（五）加强实验室人员职业安全防护和健康管理工作，定期进行健康检查，必要时对有关人员进行免疫接种，保障医务人员的职业安全。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（六）医学检验实验室工作人员在工作中发生职业暴露事件时，应当采取相应的处理措施，并及时报告机构内的相关部门。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（七）医学检验实验室管理人员应定期对实验室的危害因子和安全风险进行评估，确保实验室安全。定期举行实验室生物安全和消防安全演练并形成记录。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	五、监督与管理<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（一）各级卫生计生行政部门应当加强辖区内医学检验实验室的监督管理，发现存在质量问题或者安全隐患时,应当责令其立即整改。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（二）各级卫生计生行政部门履行监督检查职责时，有权采取下列措施：<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	1.对医学检验实验室进行现场检查，了解情况，调查取证；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	2.查阅或者复制医学检验质量和安全管理的有关资料，采集、封存样品；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	3.责令违反本规范及有关规定的医学检验实验室停止违法违规行为；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	4.对违反本规范及有关规定的行为进行处理。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	（三）医学检验实验室出现以下情形的，卫生计生行政部门应当视情节依法依规从严从重处理：<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	1.使用非专业技术人员从事医学检验工作的；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	2.出具虚假检验报告的；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	3.未开展室内质量控制、未参加省级及以上临床检验中心组织的室间质量评价的；或者参加室间质量评价连续两次以上不合格，经整改后仍不合格的；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	4.其他违反《医疗机构管理条例》及《医疗机构管理条例实施细则》的情形。</span></span></p>\r\n<br />\r\n','','','113.118.4.210');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('220','6','<h2 class=\"rich_media_title\" id=\"activity-name\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 14px; padding: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.4;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</h2>\r\n<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; width: 670px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 3px 0px 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; float: left; line-height: 1; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; animation: ent_zoomIn 1.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal both paused; font-size: 44.8px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								葡</section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; min-height: 4.5em !important;\">\r\n				<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; animation: ent_moveInRightNear 1.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal both paused; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								萄糖-6-磷酸脱氢酶（G-6-PD）缺乏症，俗称<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(249, 110, 87); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">蚕豆病</span>，表现为在遗传性葡萄糖-6-磷酸脱氢酶（G-6-PD）缺陷的情况下，食用新鲜蚕豆后突然发生的急性血管内溶血。我国是本病的高发区之一，呈南高北低的分布特点，患病率为0.2-44.8%，G6PD缺乏症发病原因是由于G6PD基因突变，导致该酶活性降低，红细胞不能抵抗氧化损伤而遭受破坏，引起溶血性贫血。以此，这是一种<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(249, 110, 87); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">遗传病</span></strong>。</section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				&nbsp;</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"font-variant-numeric: normal; height: 200px;\" /></div>\r\n<br style=\"color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 17px; text-align: justify;\" />\r\n<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 44.8px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								早</section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; min-height: 4.5em !important;\">\r\n				<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; animation: ent_moveInRightNear 1.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal both paused; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								期有恶寒、微热、头晕、倦怠无力、食欲缺乏、腹痛，继之出现黄疸、贫血、血红蛋白尿，尿呈酱油色，此后体温升高，倦怠乏力加重，可持续3日左右。与溶血性贫血出现的同时，出现呕吐、腹泻和腹痛加剧，肝脏肿大，肝功能异常，约50%患者脾大。严重病例可见昏迷、惊厥和急性肾衰竭，若急救不及时常于1-2日内死亡。</section>\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;大多食用蚕豆后1至2天发病，早期症状有厌食、疲劳、低热、恶心、不定性的腹痛，接着因溶血而发生眼角黄染及全身黄疸，出现酱油色尿和贫血症状。严重时有尿团、休克、心功能和肾功能衰竭，重度缺氧时还可见双眼固定性偏斜。此时如不及时抢救可于1至2天内死亡。</section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n				<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								&nbsp;</section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				&nbsp;</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 12.8px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; height: 2em; line-height: 2em; display: inline-block; vertical-align: top; color: white; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(239, 66, 119); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					疾病检查</section>\r\n				<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					&nbsp;</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; vertical-align: top; width: 0px; border-left: 1em solid rgb(239, 66, 119); font-size: 16px; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-top: 1em solid transparent !important; border-bottom: 1em solid transparent !important;\">\r\n				&nbsp;</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; width: 0px; border-right: 0.6em solid rgb(2, 32, 99); border-top: 0.6em solid rgb(2, 32, 99); word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left: 0.6em solid transparent !important; border-bottom: 0.6em solid transparent !important;\">\r\n				&nbsp;</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; text-align: center; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; width: 670px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 3px 0px 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; float: left; line-height: 1; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				&nbsp;</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; min-height: 4.5em !important;\">\r\n				<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; animation: ent_moveInRightNear 1.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal both paused; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(249, 110, 87); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">1、血象</span></strong></section>\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								a、血红蛋白急剧下降，重者降至10克/升以下；b、红细胞最低降至0.5*1012/升以下；c、网织红细胞明显增高&gt;0.20；d、外周血图片可见有核红细胞增多；f、白细胞数升高，可达（10-20）*109/升，甚至呈类白血病反应；e、血小板计数正常或增高。</section>\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(249, 110, 87); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">2、骨髓象</span></strong></section>\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								a、红细胞系、粒细胞系均明显增生，年龄越小粒细胞系增生愈明显；b、红细胞系以中晚幼红细胞增生为主。</section>\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(249, 110, 87); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">3、尿检查</span></strong></section>\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								a、尿呈酱油色、浓茶色、红葡萄酒色、洗肉水色、黄色等；b、尿隐血试验阳性率可达60%-70%；c、尿检验可见蛋白、红细胞及管型，尿胆原及尿胆素均阳性；d、血清游离血红蛋白增高。结合珠蛋白减低；e、葡萄糖-6-磷酸脱氢酶活性检测减低。</section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				&nbsp;</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"font-variant-numeric: normal; height: 2em; line-height: 2em; display: inline-block; vertical-align: top; color: white; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(239, 66, 119); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					疾病治疗和预防</section>\r\n				<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					&nbsp;</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; display: inline-block; vertical-align: top; float: left; line-height: 1; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				&nbsp;</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; min-height: 4.5em !important;\">\r\n				<section powered-by=\"xiumi.us\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; animation: ent_moveInRightNear 1.5s ease-in-out 0s 1 normal both paused; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;本病无特殊治疗方法，<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(249, 110, 87); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">新生儿疾病筛查是早期诊断、预防的重点</span></strong>。同时，在本病的高发地区，患者应用氧化性药物前，应常规进行本病的筛查。其中，通过基因检查确定G6PD基因是否变异是诊断该病的金标准。不能进食蚕豆及其制品（如粉丝、豆瓣酱），亦不能使用可能引起溶血的药物，如抗疟疾药（伯胺喹啉、奎宁）、退热药（氨基比林、非那西丁）、痢特灵、磺胺类药物。如果收藏衣物使用了樟脑丸，穿衣以前要暴晒，因为萘也可引起溶血。本病为遗传性疾病，但属于科预防性疾病，有一定的诱因才发病，一般不必要对胎儿进行产前诊断。</section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;本次会议邀请了国内部分重要合作伙伴及潜力合作伙伴参会；公司总经理宁紫妍女士携团队主要成员与来自全国各地的合作伙伴共同参加了会议，会议同时邀请了深圳市中润医学技术研究院院长闵书亮博士参加。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 26日会议伊始，宁紫妍总经理首先转达了总部德国维润赛润研发有限公司对各位合作伙伴的感谢和问候，祝贺本次会议圆满成功！宁总在致辞中，对各地合作伙伴到来表示热烈欢迎，对大家长期以来对维润赛润品牌和产品的支持与认同表示衷心感谢。宁总提出研讨会将按照小规模、高质量和多创新的形式进行，并对新经济形势和行业宏观经济政策新变化情况下，IVD企业将面对的新挑战和对策分享了自己的思考。宁总强调，维润赛润深圳公司将与各合作伙伴更加紧密的合作，相信未来会共同创造更多的市场价值。</span><br />\r\n<br />\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/181031/1-1Q0311A212541.jpg\" style=\"width: 850px; INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('222','6','<div class=\"rich_media_content \" id=\"js_content\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; overflow: hidden; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 17px; word-wrap: break-word; text-align: justify; font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">试剂间干扰的原因</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		很多类型的全自动生化分析仪因其清洗系统的工作模式所致，一个项目对紧随其后的一个项目甚至几个项目的测定会带来一定程度的试剂污染，并且随着仪器使用时间的累加，仪器状况的下降，试剂交叉污染的程度会有所加剧。因此避免试剂间的干扰，变得非常重要。试剂的干扰有两个原因：一是碱基中含有下一个测试所要测定的底物，或是含有的某种试剂成分与下一反应所要测定的底物有作用，因而直接干扰下一反应的测定结果：另一个则是该试剂所引导的反应对下一个项目的反应进程带来了间接的干扰，因为在有试剂污染的情况下，下一项目所测定的是前后两个项目反应的综合结果。下面通过对试剂成分的分析和相应试剂来找出试剂交叉污染可能带来的情况，进而指导相应的项目调整和结果分析。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">试剂间可能发生的干扰的情况</span></strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		1、ALT(IFCC)、AST(IFCC)试剂中含有高活力LD成分，有可能对LD的测定带来干扰。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		2、ALP(IFCC)、CK、CK-MB、CO2、&alpha;-AMY等试剂中使用磷酸缓冲液，可能会对其后的MG2+测定带来干扰。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		3、CHE、GLU、UA、&alpha;-HBDH等试剂使用磷酸缓冲液，可能会对无机磷的测定带来干扰。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		4、CK、CK-MB试剂中含有GLU成分，其分析方法的原理中包含GLU的己糖酸梅反应过程，因此可能对GLU测定带来干扰，尤其对GLU的HK法测定可能带来干扰。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		5、MG2+试剂中含有EGTA成分，为Ca2+络合剂，可能对Ca2+的测定带来干扰。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">干扰的排查和发现</span></strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		事实上各个公司所提供的产品说明书常不能够全面反映试剂组成的情况，因此通过实验发现试剂交叉污染可能带来的干扰变得相当重要。下面以两个试验来加以说明：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		1、将某一试剂作为样本进行全套项目测定，考察结果的情况，进而确定发生试剂交叉污染是造成直接干扰的项目。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		2、1份样本分为两份，一份加生理盐水或其他适当的稀释液，另一份加等量的试剂，同时测定、考虑结果的变化，进而确定可能发生试剂交叉污染时造成干扰的项目。进行这一实验时，使用半自动生化分析仪可能会得到更为理想的结果，尤其是针对双试剂反应时，R1、R2加入时机可以得到更为精确的试剂。此外，由于试剂成分的复杂多样性，实时仪器状况的独特性，可能发生的试剂间的交叉污染的情况不尽相同。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">干扰的避免</strong></span></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		除去仪器的试剂针的携带污染及清洗系统的工作模式外，试剂间的严重干扰会极大的影响测定结果的准确性，因此隔绝二者间的联系非常必要。一般在安排项目顺序时要求两个项目间至少要有一个非干扰项目，而最彻底的做法则是将被干扰项目置于干扰项目之前，以消除干扰发生的可能。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		同时要求检验人员对仪器工作状态要了如指掌，并在一个样本的项目选择或一个样本的最后一项与下一个样本的第一个项目选择时对于试剂交叉污染的可能性加以考虑，合理安排项目顺序，以使得到更为合理的结果。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		来源：检验医学</p>\r\n</div>\r\n<br />\r\n','','','119.136.153.103');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('223','6','<h2 class=\"rich_media_title\" id=\"activity-name\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 14px; padding: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.4; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 2016年11月9日，国家卫生计生委官网发布了国卫办妇幼发[2016]45号文件&mdash;&mdash;《国家卫生计生委办公厅关于规范有序开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断工作的通知》(以下简称《通知》)，废止此前无创产前筛查与诊断试点机构相关规定，正式取消无创产前筛查与诊断试点，并对开展无创产前筛查和诊断的医疗机构和人员作出了新的规定，发布了《孕妇外周血胎儿游离<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; color: blue; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">DNA产前筛查与诊断技术规范</span><span style=\"color: rgb(35, 35, 35); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify;\">》，内容主要包括开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断技术的基本要求、适用范围、临床服务流程、检测技术流程以及质量控制指标等。</span></span></h2>\r\n<div class=\"rich_media_content \" id=\"js_content\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; overflow: hidden; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 17px; word-wrap: break-word; text-align: justify; font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		具体内容如下：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前</strong><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 12px;\">筛查与诊断技术规范</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与</span>诊断是应用高通量基因测序等分子遗传技术检测孕期母体外周血中胎儿游离DNA片段，以评估胎儿常见染色体非整倍体异常风险。为规范该类技术的临床应用，制订本规范。本规范主要包括开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断技术的基本要求、适用范围、临床服务流程、检测技术流程以及质量控制指标等内容。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		第一部分&nbsp; 基本要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		一、机构要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断的医疗机构应当获得产前诊断技术类《母婴保健技术服务执业许可证》。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断采血服务的医疗机构(以下简称采血机构)应当为有资质的产前筛查或产前诊断机构。开展采血服务的产前筛查机构须与产前诊断机构建立合作关系，并向省级卫生计生行政部门备案。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp; （三）开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA实验室检测的医疗机构（以下简称检测机构）应当具备临床基因扩增检验实验室资质，严格遵守《医疗机构临床实验室管理办法》、《医疗机构临床基因扩增检验实验室管理办法》等相关规定，相应检验项目应当接受国家卫生计生委临床检验中心组织的室间质量评价。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;二、人员要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）从事孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断的专业技术人员应当按照《产前诊断技术管理办法》要求取得相应资质。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）从事孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前检测的实验室人员应当经过省级以上卫生计生行政部门组织的临床基因扩增检验技术培训，并获得培训合格证书。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		三、设备试剂要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）在具备细胞遗传学实验诊断设备的基础上，同时具备开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断相应的主要设备，包括DNA提取设备、PCR仪、高通量基因测序仪或其他分子检测设备等。设备的种类、数量应当与实际开展检测项目及检测量相匹配。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）设备、试剂和数据分析软件应当符合《医疗器械监督管理条例》和《医疗器械注册管理办法》等相关规定，经过食品药品监督管理部门批准注册。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		四、工作要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）严格遵守《中华人民共和国母婴保健法》及其实施办法、《产前诊断技术管理办法》、《医疗机构临床实验室管理办法》等有关规定。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）产前诊断机构与产前筛查机构建立合作关系时，双方应当签订协议明确各自责任和义务。具体要求如下：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;1.产前筛查机构主要负责制订产前筛查方案、检测前咨询、检测申请（包括签署知情同意书、标本采集、检测信息采集）、对检测结果为低风险人群进行后续咨询、妊娠结局随访等。产前筛查机构应当及时将检测标本送至有合作关系的产前诊断机构，由产前诊断机构安排进行后续检测。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;2.产前诊断机构主要负责确定产前筛查与诊断方案、标本检测、出具发放临床报告、对检测结果为高风险人群进行后续咨询、诊断与妊娠结局随访等。产前诊断机构负责对具有合作关系的产前筛查机构进行技术指导、人员培训和质量控制。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（三）产前诊断机构与其他具备高通量基因测序等分子遗传技术能力的医疗机构合作时，双方应当签订协议明确各自责任和义务，并向省级卫生计生行政部门备案。具体要求如下：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		1.产前诊断机构负责临床服务。主要包括确定产前筛查与诊断方案、检测前咨询、检测申请（包括签署知情同意书、标本采集、检测信息采集）、依据检测结果出具发放临床报告、后续咨询、诊断与妊娠结局随访等。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		2.检测机构负责提供检测技术。包括检测技术平台建设、技术人员培训、技术支持、开展室内质量控制和室间评价、标本转运与检测, 提供检测结果并对检测结果负责，按照本规定保存相关标本、信息资料等，接受卫生计生行政部门的监督检查。检测机构不可直接面向孕妇开展外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断临床服务。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all;
