max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		三、阳性预测值</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		21三体综合征、18三体综合征、13三体综合征的复合阳性预测值不低于50%。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		四、检测失败率</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		由于凝血、溶血、DNA质量控制不合格等标本原因造成的检测失败率不超过5%。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 仿宋_GB2312; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 1.5; word-break: break-all; outline: 0px; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n</div>\r\n<br />\r\n','','','119.136.153.103');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('230','6','<h2 class=\"rich_media_title\" id=\"activity-name\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 14px; padding: 0px; font-weight: 400; font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.4; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 2016年11月9日，国家卫生计生委官网发布了国卫办妇幼发[2016]45号文件&mdash;&mdash;《国家卫生计生委办公厅关于规范有序开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断工作的通知》(以下简称《通知》)，废止此前无创产前筛查与诊断试点机构相关规定，正式取消无创产前筛查与诊断试点，并对开展无创产前筛查和诊断的医疗机构和人员作出了新的规定，发布了《孕妇外周血胎儿游离<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; color: blue; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">DNA产前筛查与诊断技术规范</span><span style=\"color: rgb(35, 35, 35); font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify;\">》，内容主要包括开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断技术的基本要求、适用范围、临床服务流程、检测技术流程以及质量控制指标等。</span></span></h2>\r\n<div class=\"rich_media_content \" id=\"js_content\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; overflow: hidden; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 17px; word-wrap: break-word; text-align: justify; font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		具体内容如下：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前</strong><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 12px;\">筛查与诊断技术规范</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与</span>诊断是应用高通量基因测序等分子遗传技术检测孕期母体外周血中胎儿游离DNA片段，以评估胎儿常见染色体非整倍体异常风险。为规范该类技术的临床应用，制订本规范。本规范主要包括开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断技术的基本要求、适用范围、临床服务流程、检测技术流程以及质量控制指标等内容。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		第一部分&nbsp; 基本要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		一、机构要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断的医疗机构应当获得产前诊断技术类《母婴保健技术服务执业许可证》。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断采血服务的医疗机构(以下简称采血机构)应当为有资质的产前筛查或产前诊断机构。开展采血服务的产前筛查机构须与产前诊断机构建立合作关系，并向省级卫生计生行政部门备案。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp; （三）开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA实验室检测的医疗机构（以下简称检测机构）应当具备临床基因扩增检验实验室资质，严格遵守《医疗机构临床实验室管理办法》、《医疗机构临床基因扩增检验实验室管理办法》等相关规定，相应检验项目应当接受国家卫生计生委临床检验中心组织的室间质量评价。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;二、人员要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）从事孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断的专业技术人员应当按照《产前诊断技术管理办法》要求取得相应资质。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）从事孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前检测的实验室人员应当经过省级以上卫生计生行政部门组织的临床基因扩增检验技术培训，并获得培训合格证书。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		三、设备试剂要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）在具备细胞遗传学实验诊断设备的基础上，同时具备开展孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断相应的主要设备，包括DNA提取设备、PCR仪、高通量基因测序仪或其他分子检测设备等。设备的种类、数量应当与实际开展检测项目及检测量相匹配。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）设备、试剂和数据分析软件应当符合《医疗器械监督管理条例》和《医疗器械注册管理办法》等相关规定，经过食品药品监督管理部门批准注册。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		四、工作要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）严格遵守《中华人民共和国母婴保健法》及其实施办法、《产前诊断技术管理办法》、《医疗机构临床实验室管理办法》等有关规定。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）产前诊断机构与产前筛查机构建立合作关系时，双方应当签订协议明确各自责任和义务。具体要求如下：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;1.产前筛查机构主要负责制订产前筛查方案、检测前咨询、检测申请（包括签署知情同意书、标本采集、检测信息采集）、对检测结果为低风险人群进行后续咨询、妊娠结局随访等。产前筛查机构应当及时将检测标本送至有合作关系的产前诊断机构，由产前诊断机构安排进行后续检测。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;2.产前诊断机构主要负责确定产前筛查与诊断方案、标本检测、出具发放临床报告、对检测结果为高风险人群进行后续咨询、诊断与妊娠结局随访等。产前诊断机构负责对具有合作关系的产前筛查机构进行技术指导、人员培训和质量控制。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（三）产前诊断机构与其他具备高通量基因测序等分子遗传技术能力的医疗机构合作时，双方应当签订协议明确各自责任和义务，并向省级卫生计生行政部门备案。具体要求如下：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		1.产前诊断机构负责临床服务。主要包括确定产前筛查与诊断方案、检测前咨询、检测申请（包括签署知情同意书、标本采集、检测信息采集）、依据检测结果出具发放临床报告、后续咨询、诊断与妊娠结局随访等。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		2.检测机构负责提供检测技术。包括检测技术平台建设、技术人员培训、技术支持、开展室内质量控制和室间评价、标本转运与检测, 提供检测结果并对检测结果负责，按照本规定保存相关标本、信息资料等，接受卫生计生行政部门的监督检查。检测机构不可直接面向孕妇开展外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断临床服务。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（四）产前诊断机构应当定期向省级卫生计生行政部门报送相关信息，由省级卫生计生行政部门汇总后按要求报送国家卫生计生委。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp; （五）相关医疗机构要按照医学伦理原则，自觉维护孕妇权益，保护孕妇隐私。医务人员要坚持知情选择原则,全面、客观介绍各类产前筛查与诊断技术的适用人群、优缺点以及可供选择的产前筛查与诊断方案等，取得孕妇或其家属同意后方可开展。重要事项需经过本单位伦理委员会审议通过。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（六）严禁发布虚假医疗广告和信息，严禁夸大本技术临床应用效果。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（七）严禁任何机构或人员利用孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断技术进行非医学需要的胎儿性别鉴定。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		第二部分 适用范围</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		一、目标疾病</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		根据目前技术发展水平，孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前筛查与诊断的目标疾病为3种常见胎儿染色体非整倍体异常，即21三体综合征、18三体综合征、13三体综合征。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		二、适宜时间</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA检测适宜孕周为12<sup style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">+0</sup>～22<sup style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">+6</sup>周。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		三、适用人群</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）血清学筛查显示胎儿常见染色体非整倍体风险值介于高风险切割值与1/1000之间的孕妇。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）有介入性产前诊断禁忌证者（如先兆流产、发热、出血倾向、慢性病原体感染活动期、孕妇Rh阴性血型等）。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp; （三）孕20<sup style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">+6</sup>周以上，错过血清学筛查最佳时间，但要求评估21三体综合征、18三体综合征、13三体综合征风险者。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		四、慎用人群</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		有下列情形的孕妇进行检测时，检测准确性有一定程度下降，检出效果尚不明确；或按有关规定应建议其进行产前诊断的情形。包括：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）早、中孕期产前筛查高风险。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）预产期年龄&ge;35岁。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（三）重度肥胖（体重指数&gt;40）。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（四）通过体外受精&mdash;&mdash;胚胎移植方式受孕。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（五）有染色体异常胎儿分娩史，但除外夫妇染色体异常的情形。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（六）双胎及多胎妊娠。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（七）医师认为可能影响结果准确性的其他情形。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		五、不适用人群</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp; 有下列情形的孕妇进行检测时，可能严重影响结果准确性。包括：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;（一）孕周&lt;12<sup style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">＋0</sup>周。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;（二）夫妇一方有明确染色体异常。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		(三）1年内接受过异体输血、移植手术、异体细胞治疗等。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（四）胎儿超声检查提示有结构异常须进行产前诊断。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（五）有基因遗传病家族史或提示胎儿罹患基因病高风险。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（六）孕期合并恶性肿瘤。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（七）医师认为有明显影响结果准确性的其他情形。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		除外上述不适用情形的，孕妇或其家属在充分知情同意情况下，可选择孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前检测。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		第三部分&nbsp; 临床服务流程</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp; 一、检测前咨询及知情同意</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）对符合适用人群情形并自愿进行检测的，或符合慎用人群情形但在充分告知并知情同意的前提下仍自愿要求进行检测的孕妇，医师应当对孕妇本人及其家属详细告知该检测的目标疾病、目的、意义、准确率、局限性、风险以及其他筛查与诊断方案，与孕妇本人或其家属签署知情同意书并填写申请单。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; （二）知情同意书应当包括以下要点（参考模板见附表1）：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		1.告知本技术的目标疾病。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		2.告知本技术的检出率、假阳性和假阴性率，强调该检测结果不是产前诊断结果，高风险结果必须进行介入性产前诊断以确诊，以及检测费用及流程等。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		3.告知本技术有因检测失败重新采血的可能。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		4.告知影响该检测准确性的相关因素。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		5.医师对病例个案认为应该说明的相关问题。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（三）对未接受中孕期血清学筛查直接选择孕妇外周血胎儿游离DNA产前检测的孕妇，应当在中孕期进行胎儿神经管缺陷风险评估。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px 0.65pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（四）产前筛查机构承担采血服务时，知情同意书应当一式两份，一份留存产前筛查机构，一份随标本运转至有合作关系的产前诊断机构。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 二、检测信息采集</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		医师应当仔细询问孕妇基本情况、孕产史、本次妊娠情况、既往史和家族史等，如实、准确、详细填写检测申请单（参考模板见附表2）。检测申请单第一联由产前诊断机构留存，第二联由检测机构留存。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 三、标本采集及运转</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）标本编号。采血机构应当对采血管进行唯一编号。该编号应当与知情同意书、检测申请单和临床报告单编号一致。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）标本采集。按照无菌操作要求，采取孕妇外周静脉血。标本的采集和处理均应当按照标准操作流程和产品说明书要求进行。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（三）标本的分离、保存和运转。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp; 1.采用常规乙二胺四乙酸（以下简称EDTA）抗凝采血管采集的标本应当自离体后8小时内完成血浆分离，在干冰冷链状态下暂时保存及运转。采用专用血浆保存管的，可在室温下完成暂时保存与运转。此操作环节须双人复核。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;2.标本应当与知情同意书、检测申请单等资料同时运转。运转过程应当符合生物安全和环境要求，同时做好交接记录。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		四、临床报告的出具发放</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; （一）自采血至发放临床报告时间不超过15个工作日，其中发出因检测失败须重新采血通知的时间不超过10个工作日。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）临床报告应当由副高以上职称并具备产前诊断资质的临床医师出具发放。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（三）临床报告应当以开展相关技术的产前诊断机构名义出具，以书面报告形式告知受检者。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（四）临床报告应当包括以下信息（参考模板见附表3）：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		1.送检单位和送检医师姓名。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		2.孕妇基本信息，包括姓名、年龄、末次月经时间、孕周等。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		3.标本信息，包括标本编号、标本状态、采血日期等。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		4.检测项目和检测方法。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		5.目标疾病检测值、参考范围、低风险或高风险结果。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		6.结果描述与建议。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		7.检测单位、检测时间、检测人员及审核人员签名。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		8.临床报告审核发放时间、审核医师签名。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		五、检测后咨询及处置</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 对检测结果为低风险的孕妇，采血机构应当建议其定期进行常规产前检查；如果同时存在胎儿影像学检查异常，应当对其进行后续咨询及相应产前诊断。对检测结果为高风险的孕妇，产前诊断机构应当尽快通知其到本机构进行后续咨询及相应产前诊断。咨询率应达到100%，产前诊断率应达到95%以上。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		对于目标疾病以外的其他异常高风险结果，产前诊断机构应当告知孕妇本人或其家属进行进一步咨询和诊断。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		六、妊娠结局随访</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）采血机构应当负责对孕妇的妊娠结局进行追踪随访。对检测结果为高风险的孕妇，妊娠结局随访率应达到100%；对检测结果为低风险的孕妇，妊娠结局随访率应达到90%以上。随访应至少至分娩后12周，有条件的可随访至分娩后1年。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）随访内容应包括：后期流产、引产、早产或足月产、死产、死胎等妊娠结局，是否为21三体综合征、18三体综合征、13三体综合征患儿，有条件的可将后期流产、死胎的遗传学诊断纳入妊娠结局随访内容。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		七、标本与资料信息的保存</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		采血机构负责保存知情同意书，产前诊断机构负责保存检测申请单第一联。检测机构负责保存检测申请单第二联、实验室检测核心数据信息和剩余标本。标本、信息和资料的保存期限应不少于3年。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		第四部分&nbsp; 检测技术流程</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		一、标本的接收</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		检测机构应当制定标本接收和拒收原则。拒绝接收不符合要求的标本时应当书面反馈拒收原因，具体拒收情况包括：</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）标本采集不当，如抗凝剂使用不正确、容器使用不正确、严重溶血或有血凝块、采血管破裂或开盖、标本标识不清等。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）标本未按照规定的温度、时限等保存和运输。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（三）检测申请单填写不完整。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		二、信息记录要求</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		在标本检测过程中，应当及时、准确、如实记录操作人员、仪器、试剂及检测数据等相关信息。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		三、血浆DNA的提取</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;血浆DNA提取应当在标本制备区进行，各项操作应当符合标准操作流程和说明书要求。如提取2次仍不符合质量标准，应当与采血机构充分进行沟通后决定后续处理。剩余的血浆标本应当在-70℃以下保存不少于3年，避免反复冻融。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		四、文库构建</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		文库构建流程和上机文库质量评估应当严格按照标准操作流程进行。实验操作应当符合《医疗机构临床基因扩增检验实验室管理办法》相关要求。文库检测浓度及文库片段分布范围应当符合试剂说明书的要求。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		五、DNA序列分析</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		DNA序列分析应当在扩增产物分析区（如测序区域）按照标准操作流程进行。实验室分区温度和湿度应当符合设备说明书要求。每个标本有效数据量、唯一比对序列数目等均应当符合试剂说明书要求。DNA序列分析应当严格按照产品说明书具体要求进行。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		六、数据分析与结果判断</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto 0px -3.15pt; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）检测质量合格的标本应当严格按照产品说明书进行实验室结果判读。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）检测质量不合格的标本应当重新提取DNA再次检测，再次检测后仍不符合数据分析或结果判断质量要求的标本，检测机构应当与产前诊断机构充分沟通后确定后续处理。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; （三）检测机构应当按照检测方法相关说明书要求建立有关数据质量参考标准。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		七、检测结果的出具</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（一）检测机构填写临床报告中检测结果部分，描述目标疾病的高风险或低风险结果。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		（二）对检测失败的样本，检测机构应当发放检测失败报告并注明原因。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		八、检测数据的存储与安全</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		相关医疗机构应当严格保护孕妇隐私，严禁泄漏受检者信息，采取措施确保信息安全。检测数据应当进行安全备份，并与互联网物理隔离。可追溯原始序列的核心数据保存应当不少于3年。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; text-align: center; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		第五部分&nbsp; 质量控制指标</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		一、检出率</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		21三体综合征检出率不低于95%，18三体综合征检出率不低于85%，13三体综合征检出率不低于70%。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		二、假阳性率</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		21三体综合征、18三体综合征、13三体综合征的复合假阳性率不高于0.5%。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		三、阳性预测值</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		21三体综合征、18三体综合征、13三体综合征的复合阳性预测值不低于50%。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		四、检测失败率</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px auto; padding: 0px 0px 16px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;; line-height: 32px; color: rgb(35, 35, 35); word-break: break-all; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		由于凝血、溶血、DNA质量控制不合格等标本原因造成的检测失败率不超过5%。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 仿宋_GB2312; font-size: 16pt; line-height: 1.5; word-break: break-all; outline: 0px; box-sizing: border-box !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n</div>\r\n<br />\r\n','','','119.136.153.103');

INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('234','6','<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size: 14px;\">作者：朱江</span></div>\r\n<span style=\"font-size: 16px;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-size: 14px;\">2018年11月8日，我接受公司的委托，参加了深圳市市场和质量监管委举办的医疗器械注册审评及产品设计与临床应用培训班。深圳市市场和质量监管委邀请了广东省食品药品监督管理局深圳医疗器械审评认证中心的审评老师及多家医院的临床专家讲课，非常精彩，切合实务，大家都非常满意！<br />\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp; 培训内容：1、深圳医疗器械审评认证中心注册审评情况及工作展望；2、有源医疗器械常见发补问题；3、体外诊断医疗器械的常见发补问题；4、医疗器械的产品创新；5、临床需求分析；6、问答</span>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/181114/1-1Q114145A3146.png\" style=\"width: 719px; height: 522px;\" /></div>\r\n<br />\r\n<span style=\"font-size:14px;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 2017年6月26日，广东省食品药品监督管理局审评认证中心深圳医疗器械审评认证中心在深圳市挂牌成立。深圳医疗器械审评认证中心专门承担深圳市医疗器械生产企业申报二类医疗器械的注册技术审评和现场核查工作，是全国第一个独立运作的地市审评中心。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;深圳市医疗器械审评认证中心的胡老师就体外诊断医疗器械的常见发补问题，进行了精彩讲解，效果显著。</span>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/181114/1-1Q114145R4A2.png\" style=\"width: 804px; height: 421px;\" /></div>\r\n<br />\r\n<span style=\"font-size:14px;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 最后是医院的临床专家讲需求分析，切合实际，大家都感觉有用，非常好。希望以后有更多好的培训班！</span>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/181114/1-1Q114145U1202.png\" style=\"width: 808px; height: 299px;\" /></div>\r\n','','','119.136.155.183');

INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('236','6','<div class=\"rich_media_content \" id=\"js_content\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; overflow: hidden; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-size: 17px; word-wrap: break-word; text-align: justify; font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		停经40天时，准妈妈做的妊娠尿样呈阳性，医生会告诉你&ldquo;你怀孕了&rdquo;。如果一切正常，医生会提醒你：到孕12周时再来医院做检查，并建立生产档案。 以下提及的14项化验检查均在准妈妈建立生产档案时化验，准妈妈抽血前一晚需清淡饮食，忌吃大鱼大肉，抽血当天早晨需空腹。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">血常规检查 检查项目：血红蛋白、血小板、白细胞等，</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">主要判断准妈妈是否贫血。</span></strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：白细胞在机体内起着消灭病原体，保卫健康的作用，正常值是4~10&times;10<sup style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;\">9</span></sup>/L，超过这个范围说明有感染的可能。血小板在止血过程中起重要作用，正常值为100~300&times;10<sup style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;\">12</span></sup>/L，如果低于100&times;10<sup style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;\">12</span></sup>/L，会影响准妈的凝血功能。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">尿常规检查 检查项目：尿液中蛋白、糖及酮体，镜检红细胞和白细胞等</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		正常情况下，上述指标均为阴性。 看懂报告：如果蛋白阳性，提示有妊娠高血压、肾脏疾病的可能。如果糖或酮体阳性，说明有糖尿病的可能，需进一步检查。如果发现有红细胞和白细胞，则提示有尿路感染的可能，需引起重视。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">肝、肾功能检查 检查项目：谷丙转氨酶(GPT)、谷草转氨酶(GOT)、尿素氮(BUN)、肌酐(Cr)等</span></strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		主要是检查准妈有无肝炎、肾炎等疾病。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：肝功能正常值：谷丙转氨酶0~55U/L;谷草转氨酶0~55U/L。 肾功能正常值：尿素氮9~20mg/dl;肌酐0.5~1.1mg/dl。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">血型检查 检查项目：(1)ABO血型；(2)Rh血型</span></strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		准妈了解自己的血型很重要，以备生产时输血。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：如果准爸爸为A型、B型或AB型血，准妈妈为O型血，生出的小宝宝有ABO溶血的可能。在亚洲人中Rh血型阴性的较少，大多数为Rh血型阳性。如果男女Rh血型不合，也有可能发生小宝宝溶血。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">TORCH综合征产前筛查 检查项目：风疹病毒(RV)、弓形虫(TOX)、巨细胞病毒(CMV)、单纯疱疹病毒(HSV)抗体</span></strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		准妈在妊娠4个月以前如果感染了以上这些病毒，都可能使胎儿发生严重的先天性畸形，甚至流产。欢迎关注怀孕百事通。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：最好在准备怀孕前进行此项检查，正常为阴性，如果检查呈阳性，应经治疗后再怀孕。对于家中养宠物的准妈妈更要进行检查。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">梅毒血清学试验 检查项目：(1)螺旋体抗体血凝试验(TPHA)；(2)快速血浆反应素试验(RPR)</span></strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		如果准妈患梅毒可通过胎盘直接传给胎儿。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：正常准妈妈这两项试验结果均为阴性。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">唐氏综合征产前筛查 检查项目：唐氏综合征血清学筛查</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&ldquo;唐筛&rdquo;是用一种比较经济、简便、对胎儿无损伤性的检测方法在准妈中查找出怀有先天愚型胎儿的高危个体。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：每位准妈在孕中期14~20周之间进行检查，阴性报告只表明胎儿发生该种先天异常的机会很低，并不能完全排除这种异常。筛查结果以风险率表示，&gt;1/275为筛查阳性，需进一步做羊水检查。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">阴道分泌物检查 检查项目：白带清洁度、念珠菌和滴虫、线索细胞</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：正常情况下清洁度为Ⅰ~Ⅱ度， Ⅲ~Ⅳ度为异常白带，表示阴道炎症；念珠菌或滴虫阳性说明有感染，需进行相应治疗；在阴道分泌物中找有线索细胞即可做出细菌性阴道病的诊断，如为阴性说明正常。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">艾滋病血清学检查 检查项目：艾滋病(HIV)抗体</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：正常准妈妈HIV抗体为阴性。如果感染了HIV病毒，则结果为阳性。HIV病毒会通过胎盘传播给胎儿。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">超声检查 检查项目：B超</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		可看到胎儿的躯体，头部、胎心跳动，胎盘、羊水和脐带等。可检测胎儿是否存活，是否为多胎、甚至还能鉴定胎儿是否畸形(如无脑儿、脑积水、肾积水、多囊肾短肢畸形、连体畸形、先天性心脏病等)。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：羊水深度在3~7厘米之间为正常，超过7厘米为羊水增多，少于3厘米则为羊水减少，都对胎儿生长不利；胎心存在，说明胎儿存活。正常胎心率为120~160次/分，低于或超出这个范围则提示胎儿在宫内有缺氧的可能。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">妊娠糖尿病筛查 检查项目：50克葡萄糖负荷试验</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		看懂报告：如果&ge;7.8mmol/L(或140mg/dL)，则说明筛查阳性，需进一步进行75克葡萄糖耐量试验，以明确有无妊娠糖尿病。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">心电图检查 检查项目：心电图</strong></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px;
