padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	主要引起唇部及口鼻周围的疱疹，偶可引起眼部决疹。不常发生在生殖器附近但可能感染皮肤的伤口，如在手指称为疱疹性脓指症。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"2185\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px 0px 0px 27px; padding: 5px 10px 0px 35px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; padding: 0px 0px 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: inherit;\">\r\n			单纯疱疹病毒2型(人类疱疹病毒2型)</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	又称为生殖器疱疹，主要引起生殖器官部位的疱疹，并可经性接触传染(见性病)，大部分是性接触传播。病灶部位在臀部、阴茎、阴道、子宫颈等生殖器附近，偶尔可见发生于其他部位但经常在腹部以下，可能会导致尿尿时灼热疼痛感，有些甚至排尿困难。有些病患有发烧、肌肉酸痛。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	单纯疱疹病毒感染目前无疫苗可预防。主要是对症治疗，严重或经常复发单纯疱疹感染可考虑口服抗病毒剂，并防止继发感染，减少复发。。较轻微皮肤感染外用药剂可改善症状缩短病程。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	一些调查研究表明HSV&mdash;1和HSV&mdash;2可能分别与唇癌、外阴癌及子宫颈癌有关。但还需进一步的深入研究。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"33\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 32px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 28px; color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(239, 112, 96); border-top-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-right-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-left-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span data-original-title=\"\" placeholder=\"1\" style=\"margin: 0px 8px 0px 0px; padding: 4px 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-radius: 80% 100% 90% 20%; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: block; float: left; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(239, 112, 96);\" title=\"\">2</span><strong data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">水痘带状疱疹病毒(人类疱疹病毒3型，HHV-3)</strong></p>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<h2 style=\"margin: 18px 0px; padding: 10px 0px; font-size: 18px; max-width: 100%; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; line-height: 1.1; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(234, 234, 234); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 15px;\">该病毒引起两种传染病，水痘或带状疱疹。</span></h2>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"85640\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; display: inline-block; float: left; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-color: rgb(226, 121, 97); background-color: rgb(226, 121, 97);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 5px 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; color: inherit;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: inherit;\">\r\n				<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: inherit;\">1</strong></section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 8px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(226, 121, 97); border-right-width: 0px; border-right-color: rgb(226, 121, 97); display: inline-block; float: left; color: inherit; border-bottom-width: 8px !important; border-bottom-style: solid !important; border-bottom-color: transparent !important; border-top-width: 8px !important; border-top-style: solid !important; border-top-color: transparent !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 0px 0px 40px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\">\r\n		<span data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: inherit;\">水痘</span></section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	HHV-3初次感染时，常引发儿童水痘，特点为全身性出现斑丘疹，而后迅速发展为水疱、脓疱，最后结痂。恢复健康儿童大多数体内已产生免役力，清除了病毒。但也有少数水痘恢复者(约20%)未能将体内病毒清除尽，病毒潜伏在脊髓后根神经节的神经元中或三叉神经节的神经元中。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"85640\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; display: inline-block; float: left; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); border-color: rgb(226, 121, 97); background-color: rgb(226, 121, 97);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 5px 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; color: inherit;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: inherit;\">\r\n				<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: inherit;\">2</strong></section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 8px; border-left-style: solid; border-left-color: rgb(226, 121, 97); border-right-width: 0px; border-right-color: rgb(226, 121, 97); display: inline-block; float: left; color: inherit; border-bottom-width: 8px !important; border-bottom-style: solid !important; border-bottom-color: transparent !important; border-top-width: 8px !important; border-top-style: solid !important; border-top-color: transparent !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 2px 0px 0px 40px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\">\r\n		<span data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: inherit;\">带状疱疹</span></section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	当机体免疫力低下时，潜伏的HHV-3病毒会重新活跃，引起沿周缘神经分布区出现条簇状皮肤疱疹，伴随神经痛，这就是&ldquo;带状疱疹&rdquo;，中医称为缠腰火丹。带状疱疹皮损常沿某一周围神经单侧分布，一般不超过体表正中线。多见于肋间神经或三叉神经第一支分布区，亦可见于胸、腹、腰、四肢、耳部等皮肤及鼻、口腔等处粘膜。其侵及三叉神经眶上支者，疼痛剧烈，并可累及角膜和眼球，甚至可引起全眼炎，招致失明。亦可引起脑炎、脑膜炎。神经痛是带状疱疹病的特征之一。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"33\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 32px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 28px; color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(239, 112, 96); border-top-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-right-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-left-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span data-original-title=\"\" placeholder=\"1\" style=\"margin: 0px 8px 0px 0px; padding: 4px 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-radius: 80% 100% 90% 20%; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: block; float: left; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(239, 112, 96);\" title=\"\">3</span><strong data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">EB病毒(人类疱疹病毒4型)</strong></p>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	由95%以上的成人所携带，是传染性单核细胞增多症的病原体，还与鼻咽癌、儿童淋巴瘤的发生有密切关系，被列为可能致癌的人类肿瘤病毒之一。EB病毒主要是通过唾液传播，因此应养成良好的个人卫生习惯。预防还可以接种EB病毒疫苗。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"33\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 32px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 28px; color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(239, 112, 96); border-top-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-right-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-left-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span data-original-title=\"\" placeholder=\"1\" style=\"margin: 0px 8px 0px 0px; padding: 4px 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-radius: 80% 100% 90% 20%; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: block; float: left; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(239, 112, 96);\" title=\"\">4</span><strong data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">巨细胞病毒(人类疱疹病毒5型，HCMV)</strong></p>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	HCMV在人群中感染非常普遍，但大多数呈临床不显性感染，多数人在儿童或青少年期受HCMV感染获得免疫。在孕妇中，原发或新的HCMV感染均可引起新生儿宫内感染或围产期感染，可导致胎儿畸形，智力低下或发育迟缓等，严重者可引起全身性感染综合症，称为巨细胞包涵体病。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	巨细胞病的治疗主要包括化学药物治疗、生物制剂治疗和对症治疗。预防可用药物预防和免疫预防等。目前没有疫苗可用于HCMV感染的预防。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"33\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 32px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 28px; color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(239, 112, 96); border-top-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-right-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-left-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span data-original-title=\"\" placeholder=\"1\" style=\"margin: 0px 8px 0px 0px; padding: 4px 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-radius: 80% 100% 90% 20%; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: block; float: left; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(239, 112, 96);\" title=\"\">5</span><strong data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">人类疱疹病毒6型(HHV-6)</strong></p>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	大多数成人唾液中均可检出少量该病毒，但因其复制数量少且过程缓慢，故除免疫低下(如先天性免疫缺陷、艾滋病、长期服用免疫抑制剂等)外，绝大多数人感染HHV-6后终身都不会产生明显症状，即终身为HHV-6隐性携带者。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	少数婴幼儿因免疫低下，感染可引起幼儿急疹(又称婴儿玫瑰疹)。临床特征为急性发热、上呼吸道症状和皮疹，病程多为3～5天，预后良好，大多无后遗症。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	目前各国对HHV-6感染尚无有效的特异性防治措施。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"33\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 32px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 28px; color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(239, 112, 96); border-top-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-right-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-left-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span data-original-title=\"\" placeholder=\"1\" style=\"margin: 0px 8px 0px 0px; padding: 4px 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-radius: 80% 100% 90% 20%; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: block; float: left; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(239, 112, 96);\" title=\"\">6</span><strong data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">人类疱疹病毒7型(HHV-7)</strong></p>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	它不同于所有已知的人类疱疹病毒，尽管其与HHV-6的同源性很小，但与其他疱疹病毒相比两者的关系最为密切。血清流行病学调查表明，HHV-7是一种普遍存在的人类疱疹病毒，HHV-7主要潜伏在外周血单核细胞和唾液腺中，人与人的密切接触可传播该病毒，唾液传播是其主要途径。该病毒的分离培养条件与HHV-6相似。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	与HHV-6一样，尚无有效的预防和治疗措施。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"33\" data-tools=\"135编辑器\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 32px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 28px; color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-bottom: 2px solid rgb(239, 112, 96); border-top-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-right-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); border-left-color: rgb(239, 112, 96); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span data-original-title=\"\" placeholder=\"1\" style=\"margin: 0px 8px 0px 0px; padding: 4px 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-radius: 80% 100% 90% 20%; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); display: block; float: left; line-height: 20px; background-color: rgb(239, 112, 96);\" title=\"\">7</span><strong data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">人类疱疹病毒8型(HHV-8)</strong></p>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei UI&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; line-height: 27.2px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	HHV-8主要存在于艾滋病卡波济肉瘤组织和艾滋病患者淋巴瘤组织中。HHV-8与卡波济肉瘤的发生、血管淋巴细胞增生性疾病及一些增生性皮肤疾病的发病有关。可通过性交传播。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 18px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 15px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-weight: 700; font-size: 12px; color: rgb(178, 178, 178);\">来源：医学论坛网</span></p>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n','','','119.136.155.162');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('241','6','<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	国卫办医函〔2016〕1315号</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; outline: 0px; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312; color: rgb(72, 72, 72); line-height: 1.5; font-size: 16pt; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	各省、自治区、直辖市卫生计生委，新疆生产建设兵团卫生局：&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　为进一步推进深化医药卫生体制改革，规范诊疗行为，保障医疗质量与安全，我委委托中华医学会组织专家制（修）订了一批临床路径；同时，对此前印发的有关临床路径进行了整理。现将上述共1010个临床路径一并在中华医学会网站（网址http://www.cma.org.cn/kjps/jsgf/）发布，供卫生计生行政部门和医疗机构参考使用。请各地卫生计生行政部门指导医疗机构结合实际，细化分支路径并组织实施。同时，要落实以下要求，进一步提高临床路径管理水平和实施效果。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; outline: 0px; font-family: 黑体;\">一、推进临床路径管理与医疗质控和绩效考核相结合&nbsp;</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　要充分发挥临床路径作为医疗质量控制与管理工具的作用，实施医疗服务全程管理，同时将临床路径管理有关要求纳入绩效考核管理，保障医疗质量与安全。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; outline: 0px; font-family: 黑体;\">二、推进临床路径管理与医疗服务费用调整相结合&nbsp;</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　要注重研究临床路径实施后医疗服务的收费情况，科学测算相关疾病医疗费用，合理控制医疗费用，进一步减轻群众看病就医负担。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; outline: 0px; font-family: 黑体;\">三、推进临床路径管理与支付方式改革相结合&nbsp;</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　通过临床路径合理测算单病种付费、按疾病相关诊断组付费（即DRGs付费）等支付方式的支付标准，有效推动支付方式改革。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; outline: 0px; font-family: 黑体;\">四、推进临床路径管理与医疗机构信息化建设相结合&nbsp;</span><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　要提高临床路径实施与管理的信息化水平，提高临床路径实施效率，加强对临床路径的实时管理和全面统计分析。&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	　　我委将适时组织对各地临床路径管理工作情况进行督导调研。&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1; outline: 0px; font-family: 仿宋_GB2312; color: rgb(72, 72, 72); text-align: right; line-height: 1.5; font-size: 16pt; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	国家卫生计生委办公厅&nbsp;<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	2016年12月2日</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('242','6','<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 2016年12月9日 讯 /生物谷BIOON/ --全球范围内50%的人群都受到&quot;猫寄生虫&quot;-刚地弓形虫的感染。在某些地区，这一感染率达到了95%。然而，除非亲自做相关的检查，否则难以发现自己受到了影响，但感染该寄生虫后却会产生一系列的精神异常症状，比如精神分裂或躁郁症等。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	研究者们最近发现了刚地弓形虫之所以能够逃离宿主免疫监察的分子机制。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 对于不知情的人来讲，刚地弓形虫仅仅是寄生在猫身上的一类能够引发弓形虫病的病原体。但其在免疫系统较弱的个体（例如孕妇，老人等）能够产生别的影响。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	当然，大部分医生都不会建议大家做专门的检测（除非万不得已），但一些研究发现其与被感染的宿主之间的一些异常行为之间存在密切的联系。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	来自捷克Charles大学的进化生物学家Jaroslav Flegr认为，弓形虫的感染能够影响我们在危险情形下的判断，因此，它与疟疾一样，也是杀伤力巨大的寄生虫类。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	过去的一些研究发现，受到弓形虫感染的小鼠在闻到猫的气味后不再害怕，而且它们的记忆力也受到了明显的损伤。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 因此，研究者们认为该寄生虫能够扰乱小鼠的大脑回路，而且他们正在研究该现象是否同样发生在人类身上。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 在众多关于弓形虫的研究中，至少有一点是肯定的，那就是它具备操控宿主免疫系统的能力。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 事实上，在地球上的某些地方，整个居民群体都受到了弓形虫的感染，这表明了它在逃脱免疫系统杀伤方面的能力。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 弓形虫一方面能够使宿主的免疫反应降到极低的水平，从而保证其生存；另一方面又能够使被感染的宿主免疫反应提高到较高水平，从而保证其身体健康，以作为一个巨大的&quot;弓形虫孵化器&quot;。如今，科学家们找到了弓形虫的感染策略。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 在正常情况下，细胞在识别弓形虫之后会激活p38蛋白的表达，以及入核，从而能够激活下游一系列炎性因子的表达并对弓形虫进行杀伤。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 而弓形虫能够主动地开启炎性因子的激活，并根据不同的需要进行程度调节。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 来自法国的研究者Mohamed-Ali Hakimi发现弓形虫能够分泌一类叫做GRA24的蛋白，该蛋白能够直接激活p38，而这一现象的发生要远远早于宿主自身免疫系统的反应。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 最近，研究者们发现GRA24能够以更高的亲和力与p33结合，从而阻断了宿主的信号传递。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 同时，该蛋白能够阻止炎性反应的关闭，这也就是为什么该疾病对于免疫系统较弱的群体来讲十分危险。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 相关结果发表在《structure》杂志上。（生物谷Bioon.com）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 20.48px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	原始出处：We finally know how the &#39;mind-altering&#39; cat parasite controls our immune response</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('247','6','<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">什么是产前筛查?</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	通过经济、操作简便、安全性佳、风险性低，准确性高，监测面广，可行性强、依从性好的无创的生化或超声检测方法，查找出患有某种严重遗传病症相对高风险的个体，建议进行相应的咨询和诊断措施。确诊后给予病人帮助和支持以决定是否继续妊娠和采取相应的措施，从而最大限度地减少异常胎儿的出生，提高整个国家的人口素质。产前筛查是一个涉及临床、助产士、实验室、超声、流行病学和公共健康领域等多学科、多部门的医学活动。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">产前筛查的意义：</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	孕妇筛查项目通常基于2个方面：减轻面对重大孕期疾病危机的夫妇的压力和负担。为社会减轻经济负担。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	我国是人口大国，也是出生缺陷和残疾高发国家。所以目前中国卫生部推荐对发病率更高的唐氏综合征（21三体综合征）、爱德华氏综合征（18三体综合征）和开放性神经管缺陷（ONTD）开展相应的筛查。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	通过三级预防网络，有效减少出生缺陷和先天残疾儿发生。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	1级：孕前保健。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	2级：孕期保健（产前筛查与诊断）。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	3级：新生儿筛查（早发现早干预）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">产前筛查对象：</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	建议所有孕妇都考虑接受产前筛查，因为唐氏儿智力严重低下，生活不能自理且无法治愈。各级卫生机构开展唐氏综合征预防工作，目的是减少出生缺陷的发生率。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">产前筛查方法：</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	先进的微粒子化学发光免疫分析技术测定孕妇血清标记物</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	(1) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;人绒毛膜促性腺激素B亚单位(BhCG)。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	(2) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;甲胎蛋白（ AFP）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	(3) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;游离雌三醇（uE3）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	(4) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;抑制素A(InhibinA)</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	结合孕妇的年龄、孕周，体重、彩超等临床信息，通过风险评估软件算风险值。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">产前筛查时间：</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	孕早期筛查：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	开展时间在孕9-13+6周。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	需要使用孕妇血样和超声检查结果来评估风险。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	超声指标是指胎儿颈部透明带（NT）厚度。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">关于NT：</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	唐氏筛查较好的单体指标能够非常好的区分正常胎儿和出生缺陷胎儿但测量结果只有几个毫米，准确的测量有一定难度必须由被相关机构认证的有资质医师进行操作，不同医师测量结果尚存在差异，不是所有的孕妇都能及时参加，且孕早期筛查只能筛查唐氏综合征，不能评估神经管畸形的风险。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	孕中期筛查：孕中期筛查是目前国内最常见的筛查方法。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	开展时间孕14-20+6周（最佳时间在15-20周）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	需要使用孕妇血样来评估风险根据对孕妇血样所检测的标记物数量不同，分为二联筛查、三联筛查和四联筛查。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	孕中期可筛查唐氏综合征（21三体综合征）、爱德华氏综合征（18三体综合征）和开放性神经管缺陷（ONTD）。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; text-align: center; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif;
