max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">②细菌，如球菌、杆菌、真菌；</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">③其他具有高毒力的病原体，如出血热病毒和立克次体等。当接触和处理所有的体液时，均应执行&ldquo;普遍性防护原则&rdquo;安全意识，所有的血液和体液均应视为有潜在的传染性，都应以安全的方式进行操作。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; text-indent: 2em;\">感染途径</span></strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">1、空气传播：在取下装有标本试管的塞子时、溶液洒落在坚硬的表面上、用未加塞子的试管进行离心或溶液(包括接种环内的溶液)加热太急时，具有传染性的溶液在上述各种情况下，可能形成气烟雾散布在空气中。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">2、经口传播：用口吸移液可能导致微生物侵入人体引起传染。传染也可通过间接途径，如饮食或吸烟前没有彻底洗手引起&ldquo;手～口&rdquo;传染。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">3、直接接种：偶然的针刺、碎玻璃划伤和动物咬伤均可通过直接接种引起传染。临床标本中的感染原也可通过被纸张轻微划伤的手指、很轻的擦伤或损伤的表皮进入人体造成感染。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">4、粘膜接触：一些病原体，包括肝炎病毒和人类免疫缺陷病毒(HIV)，能够通过与粘膜(如眼结膜)的直接接触进入人体。所以在擦拭眼睛、更换隐形眼镜或使用化妆品前应彻底洗手。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">5、血源性病原体间接接触：临床实验室工作人员都面临着接触血源性病原体的可能性。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体;\">常规预防措施</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">1、所有血液和体液的标本都应放置于具有安全盖的结构优良的容器里，以防在运输过程中发生泄漏。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">2、采集和转送标本时应防止容器的外表或随标本的检验单污染。如果存在潜在的或实际的污染，则应再加一层包装(例如：包装袋)。所有的标本应加上生物危害标签。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">3、工作人员在处理所有血液和体液及其它可能具传染性的物质、采血、处理污染的物品时都应戴上手套。如果有可能发生血液或体液的喷溅，则应使用面部防护装备。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">4、产生气烟雾或飞沫的操作包括混匀、超声雾化和剧烈搅拌均应使用生物安全橱。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">5、实验室应使用机械移液装置，绝对禁止用口吸移液。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">6、放置废弃锐利物品的容器，不能装得过满而意外伤人，应在装满后尽快运走。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">7、血液或其他体液发生泄漏或工作结束后，均应使用合适的化学杀菌剂对实验室工作区进行表面消毒。可使用新鲜配制的漂白粉溶液(次氯酸钠1:10稀释液)或其它有效的溶液对所有的工作台进行消毒。漂白粉溶液应至少作用15分钟，使用其它的消毒剂可参考其产品说明书。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">8、被血液或其他体液污染的设备在实验室内或外送商家进行维修之前，应先进行清洁和消毒。无法彻底消毒的设备必须贴上生物危害的标签。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">9、手或其他部位的皮肤在接触血液或其他体液后必须立即彻底清洗，在实验工作结束后或取下手套后应立即洗手。在离开实验室之前应脱下所有的个人防护装备。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">10、患有渗出性皮肤病变的检验人员在痊愈前不得直接接触病人，也不得接触医疗设备。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体;\">标本运输</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">1、运输前应将标本进行可靠包装。禁止使用皮氏细菌培养平皿邮寄标本。禁止将干冰放人密封的容器。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">2、严格遵守运输部门和国际空运协会的有关规定。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">3、运输用于诊断的标本时应根据需要标记上&ldquo;易腐坏&rdquo;、&ldquo;干冰保存&rdquo;、&ldquo;冷冻生物制品&rdquo;或&ldquo;易碎&rdquo;等标志。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体;\">标本处理</span></strong></span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">1、被高毒力微生物污染的物品和用于隔离的设备及材料，处理前必须经过高压灭菌。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">2、培养分枝杆菌和两性真菌用的平皿及试管必须使用胶带密封，用压力蒸气灭菌后进行处理或焚化处理。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">3、普通标本和使用过的培养基应弃放置于塑料袋中。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">4、可重复使用的物品和污染的器具应置于装有1:10次氯酸钠稀释液或其它合适的消毒剂的不锈钢容器内,然后进行高压灭菌、清洗和再次灭菌。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体;\">生物安全柜</span></strong></span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">生物安全柜是微生物实验室里控制生物危害最好的方式之一。按产品说明书进行安装、使用和维修和维护，要确保安全柜内合适的气流流速，并定期更换滤器。安全柜的放置和通风口的设置防护要求，在维护、移动和或处理安全柜之前必须对生物安全柜进行消毒。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 16px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">1、立即清洗发生泄漏污染的区域，通知安全主管和科主任。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">2、吸净漏出的液体。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">3、如果培养物发生泄漏或其容器发生破损，应对该区域进行至少10分钟的清洗，直至气溶胶或飞沫已经沉降。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">4、尽可能使用漂白剂、酒精对工作台面进行消毒。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 0.1px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 15.5556px; text-indent: 28px; line-height: 24px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 16px; line-height: 21px; font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);\">5、每个实验室都应制定有关处理含微生物的物品泄漏事故的书面措施。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 17.0667px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544px; text-align: justify; widows: 1; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: -apple-system-font, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, &quot;PingFang SC&quot;, &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, sans-serif; INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('250','7','<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/190301/1-1Z30110492CS.jpg\" style=\"width: 650px; height: 190px;\" /><br />\r\n<br />\r\n<br />\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	ELISA是一种广泛应用在测定液体样本中的蛋白、抗体、或激素的免疫分析技术。酶联免疫吸附试验的标准程序，通常是把蛋白、抗体、或激素等（即抗原）直接或是以捕捉抗体（capture Ab）固定在固相载体上，再加入一级检测抗体（primarydetection Ab），形成一个抗原抗体的复合物。如果该抗体已经用酶（enzyme）标记了，即可用来直接测定抗原的量，若无，则可利用另一个酶标记的二级抗体来测定抗原的量。测定抗原量的方法是加入该酶的底质（substrate），作用后产生出现的颜色深浅和样本中的抗原量呈正比的关系，依此原理计算出样本中的抗原总量或浓度。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	1.直接法（direct ELISA）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	将抗原直接固定在固相载体上，加入酶标记的一级抗体，即可测定抗原总量，此一级抗体的特异性非常重要。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	优势：操作手续简短，因无须使用二抗可避免交互反应。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	缺点：试验中的一抗都得用酶标记，但不是每种抗体都适合做标记，费用相对提高。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	2.间接法（indirect ELISA）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	此测定方法与直接法类似，差别在于一级抗体没有酶标记，改用酶标记的二级抗体去辨识一级抗体来测定抗原量。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	优势：二抗可以加强信号，而且有多种选择能做不同的测定分析。不加酶标记的一级抗体则能保留它最多的免疫反应性。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	缺点：交互反应发生的机率较高。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	3.双抗体夹心法（sandwich ELISA）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	被检测的抗原包被在两个抗体之间，其中一个抗体将抗原固定于固相载体上，即捕捉抗体。另一个则是检测抗体，此抗体可用酶标记后直接测定抗原的量；或不标记，再透过酶标记的二级抗体来测定抗原的量。这两种抗体必须小心选取，才可避免交互反应或竞争相同的抗原结合部位。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	优势：高灵敏、高专一性，抗原无须事先纯化。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	缺点：抗原一定得拥有两个以上的抗体结合部位。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	4.竞争法（competitive ELISA）</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	样本里的抗原（自由抗原）和纯化并固定在固相载体上的抗原（固定抗原）一起竞争相同的抗体，当样品里的自由抗原越多，就可以结合越多的抗体，而固定抗原就只能结合到较少的抗体，反之亦然。经清洗步骤，洗去自由抗原和抗体的复合物，只留下固定抗原和抗体的复合物，拿来与只有固定抗原的对照组结果相比较，根据呈色差异就可计算出样品里的抗原含量。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	优势：可适用比较不纯的样本，而且数据再现性很高。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	缺点：整体的敏感性和专一性都较差。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	最新ELISA技术：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	基于细胞法（cell-based ELISA）：是一种新的定性蛋白检测技术，将细胞直接在微孔板里培养，待检测时，不需抽提蛋白和裂解细胞，便可直接测量微孔板里蛋白经刺激或抑制作用后的变化。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	优势：无需裂解细胞，所以目标蛋白损失最少，可测定完整细胞、黏附细胞、还有非粘附细胞。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	缺点：不能测定抗原量。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: -apple-system-font, BlinkMacSystemFont, \'Helvetica Neue\', \'PingFang SC\', \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei UI\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: 0.544000029563904px; line-height: 27.2000007629395px; orphans: auto; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; Roman\",serif;}\r\n</style>\r\n<![endif]-->\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:\r\nauto;text-align:left;text-indent:24.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\nbackground:white\">\r\n	<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt\">2019</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt\">年<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>月<span lang=\"EN-US\">22-24</span>日，维润赛润生物技术（深圳）有限公司组团赴江西省南昌市参加第十六届国际检验医学暨输血仪器试剂博览会（<span lang=\"EN-US\">CACLP</span>）。</span></p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:\r\nauto;text-align:left;text-indent:24.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\nbackground:white\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:\r\n宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;mso-font-kerning:0pt\">维润赛润生物技术（深圳）有限公司是德国维润赛润研发有限公司在中国设立的唯一一家中德合资控股子公司，负责维润赛润产品和技术在中国的商务推广和技术应用与合作。在本届展会上，维润赛润展出了麻风腮百白破免</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:\r\n&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-hansi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;color:black\">疫保护水平监测、传染病检测、细菌检测和脑脊液检测等近百种试剂，同时推出了</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:black\">100</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:\r\n&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-hansi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;color:black\">多种传染病、细菌和脑脊液检测质控品。针对水痘带状疱疹病毒、细小病毒</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:black\">B19</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:\r\n&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-hansi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;color:black\">、单纯疱疹病毒等项目，维润赛润专门制定了个性化的检测方案。让业内更为欣喜的是，作为国际上重要的</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:black\">IVD</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:\r\n&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-hansi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;color:black\">原材料供应商之一，维润赛润向国内厂商隆重推出了传染病和细菌抗原、第二代人源化单克隆抗体等原材料，为国内</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:black\">IVD</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:\r\n&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-hansi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;color:black\">生产和研发厂家直接获取欧洲第一手的高品质原材料开启了一个安全便捷的通道！</span></p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:\r\nauto;text-align:left;text-indent:24.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\nbackground:white\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:\r\n宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-hansi-font-family:&quot;Times New style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:\r\n&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-hansi-font-family:&quot;Times New style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:\r\n&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-hansi-font-family:&quot;Times New table.MsoNormalTable\r\n	{mso-style-name:普通表格;\r\n	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;\r\n	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;\r\n	mso-style-noshow:yes;\r\n	mso-style-priority:99;\r\n	mso-style-parent:\"\";\r\n	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;\r\n	mso-para-margin:0cm;\r\n	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;\r\n	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\n	font-size:10.5pt;\r\n	mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;\r\n	font-family:等线;\r\n	mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;}\r\n</style>\r\n<![endif]--></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt; text-align: left;\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">大千世界，芸芸众生。有共同理想的人能走到一起共事是幸福的，真的就是一种缘分。同车渡，共游玩，心怀感恩。重要的是有机会一起做有意义的事，做能书写未来的事。</span><br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt;\">\r\n		<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/190419/1-1Z41915561KX.jpg\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 375px;\" /></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt; text-align: left;\">\r\n		<br />\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 开心是自然的，远离市区逃离工作。2019年4月，乘着春光正好，和团队一起，一群熟悉的平日里朝夕相处的亲人般的人，不自觉总会回到熟悉的话题。<br />\r\n		&nbsp;<br />\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 工作就像长了脚似的跟着走。996？社畜？也许，就是这个时代的宿命。<br />\r\n		&nbsp;<br />\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 国人习惯性的工作不纯粹，游玩也不纯粹，即解释为国情，这个说法很好哈，既然这样心里也就豁然起来，暂且偷闲吧。一路欢歌笑语，如期到达汕尾水底山温泉度假村。</span><br />\r\n		<br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt;\">\r\n		<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/190419/1-1Z4191A44I18.jpg\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 398px;\" /></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt; text-align: left;\">\r\n		<br />\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 在酒店电梯里猛然看见服务电话号码是熟悉的&ldquo;0755-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &rdquo;。200多公里之外还是你，忽然感觉没有了距离感。<br />\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 近几年各种联盟合作区已是屡见不鲜了，但是电话区域都是一样的也是不多，粤东几百公里外仍是你。</span><br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt;\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/190419/1-1Z4191A525J9.jpg\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 333px;\" /></span><br />\r\n		<br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt; text-align: left;\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">赶紧百度起来，这就是深汕合作区。忽然因为这个0755心里顿感亲切起来，原来我们并没走远。这个合作区的头还提出了一句很有情怀的口号，把理想写在大地上。<br />\r\n		&nbsp;<br />\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 大家很久以来都在拼命的赶超，拼命的创新，理想情怀似乎都是文艺青年的专有了。看来，人们心底还是渴望有点理想，也希望自己高尚起来的。至少几年的朋友圈常常有人端上鸡汤，不管是转发也好陈词也好，也是一种情愫吧。有好过没有。<br />\r\n		&nbsp;<br />\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 一辈子真的很短很短......历经千山万水,不求深刻,只求简单。大钢琴家霍洛维茨说:我用尽了一生的努力,才明白朴素原来最有力量。</span><br />\r\n		<br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align: left;\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 这是一个最好的时代，在医学科学领域，有着我们毕生的事业与追求，在我们这些人身上，生命有着比柴米油盐更高的维度。这是梦想，是理想，催人奋进，让我们为之努力，为之付出，这是一辈子的承诺。<br />\r\n		&nbsp;<br />\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 我坚信我们的团队同怀有一个信念，那便是：</span><br />\r\n		<br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/190419/1-1Z419154922N6.png\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 617px;\" /></span></p>\r\n	<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <w:WordDocument>\r\n
