</w:LatentStyles>\r\n</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 10]>\r\n<style>\r\n /* Style Definitions */\r\n table.MsoNormalTable\r\n	{mso-style-name:普通表格;\r\n	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;\r\n	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;\r\n	mso-style-noshow:yes;\r\n	mso-style-priority:99;\r\n	mso-style-parent:\"\";\r\n	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;\r\n	mso-para-margin:0cm;\r\n	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;\r\n	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\n	font-size:10.5pt;\r\n	font-family:宋体;\r\n	letter-spacing:-.25pt;}\r\n</style>\r\n<![endif]-->\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">近几年来，由真菌（主要是念珠菌、隐球菌、曲霉菌和孢子菌等）感染引发的疾病越来越引起人们的重视。据统计，目前全球有近<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>亿人患有不同程度真菌引起的相关疾病，全球每年因真菌感染及其并发症导致的死亡人数或超过<span lang=\"EN-US\">160</span>万，与结核病导致的死亡人数相近。而英国政府资助的一项研究表明，如果不制定政策来减缓包括真菌等引起的耐药性的上升，到<span lang=\"EN-US\">2050</span>年，全球将有<span lang=\"EN-US\">1000</span>万人死于耐药性，超过预计将因癌症死亡的<span lang=\"EN-US\">800</span>万人。因此，真菌对目前已知的抗菌药物耐药性的增加，是当今社会要面临的一项重大问题；而像耳念珠菌这样具有多重耐药性念珠菌&mdash;&mdash;超级细菌的出现，更是全球健康要面对的一项严重挑战。<span lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.1pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n	<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">&nbsp;</span></b></p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left\">\r\n	<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">流行病学特征： </span></b><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nfont-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n	<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">目前，已知不少于<span lang=\"EN-US\">9</span>种常见的念珠菌能引起人或动物的感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">,</span>均为条件致病菌。它们是白色念珠菌、热带念珠菌、克柔念珠菌、星形念珠菌、高里念珠菌、光滑念珠菌、近平滑念珠菌、乳酒念珠菌和耳念珠菌等。其中引起人类念珠菌病的主要是白色念珠菌，而耐药性最强的是耳念珠菌。近年来由于不合理使用抗生素、肿瘤化疗、艾滋病的流行和器官移植等使念珠菌的感染机会逐年上升，念珠菌主要引起真菌败血症、泌尿系统感染和全身感染等严重疾病，在医院血液感染中列第四位，病死率列第一位，可达<span lang=\"EN-US\">40%</span>以上，在<span lang=\"EN-US\">ICU</span>中最常发生。目前，临床光滑念珠菌和耳念珠菌检出率也有明显上升趋势。</span></p>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:\r\nZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\"><strong>下面给出的是一项结合国内外典型研究的统计表，从中大致可以了解常见念珠菌的分型以及其耐药性</strong>。</span><br />\r\n<p align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:center;line-height:150%\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><b><span style=\"font-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif;color:black;background:white\">一项念珠菌的分类占比及其耐药性的统计分析</span></b></span></p>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:\r\nZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/190426/1-1Z4261JR1314.png\" style=\"width: 600px; height: 84px;\" /></span></div>\r\n<div class=\"*\">\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">超级病菌&mdash;&mdash;耳念珠菌是一种新出现的、多重耐药的病原体，近年来在世界范围内造成多起感染暴发，它通常发生在重症监护病房<span lang=\"EN-US\">(</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">Intensive Care Unit</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:\r\n150%\">，缩写为</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">ICU</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">)</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">。<span lang=\"EN-US\">2009</span>年在一位日本患者的耳道中首次检出，并于<span lang=\"EN-US\">2011</span>年在韩国造成<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>例血流感染。<span lang=\"EN-US\">2012</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>月<span lang=\"EN-US\">-2013</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">7</span>月，耳念菌首次在委内瑞拉爆发，涉及<span lang=\"EN-US\">18</span>名患者；此后全球爆发了多起耳念菌感染事件。 全基因组测序揭示了不同大陆和次大陆上真菌的遗传分离，其中包括东亚、南亚、南美和南非。自<span lang=\"EN-US\">2004</span>年以来，国际上共收集<span lang=\"EN-US\">15,271</span>种侵入性耳念珠菌的亚型，研究者从中重新鉴定了<span lang=\"EN-US\">4</span>种亚型，最终认定耳念珠菌业已成为新的严重临床问题。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left\">\r\n		<span style=\"color:#000000;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">主要危险人群、危险因素及危害证据：</span></b></span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left\">\r\n		<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:5.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nfont-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif;color:red\">&nbsp;</span></b></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">1.</span></b><b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">主要危险人群：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;</span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\">不明原因的发烧患者；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\"> </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\">中耳炎<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>耳蜗感染患者；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;</span></span>全身感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>皮肤感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>尿路感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>手术伤口感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>心肌感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>脑膜炎<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>骨感染患者；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;</span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\">免疫力低下者<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>长期住院患者<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>养老院等群居者；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">感染者的密切接触者。</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-pagination:widow-orphan;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family:&quot;Verdana&quot;,sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-pagination:widow-orphan;background:white\">\r\n		<b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">2.</span></b><b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">主要危险因素包括：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">使用广谱抗菌素；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\">ICU</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;\r\nmso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">停留；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">使用中心静脉导管；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;<span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">免疫抑制治疗；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;<span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">使用导尿管；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">近期手术。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">3.</span></b><b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">主要危害证据：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:24.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;background:white\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">在我国，目前已经报告的耳念珠菌患者有<span lang=\"EN-US\">18</span>人，其中北京<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>人，沈阳<span lang=\"EN-US\">15</span>人，南方地区暂未发现确诊病例。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">在美国，根据美国疾控中心<span lang=\"EN-US\">CDC</span>的数据，截止到<span lang=\"EN-US\">2019</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">2</span>月底，全美耳念珠菌确诊病例有<span lang=\"EN-US\">587</span>例，其中纽约州有<span lang=\"EN-US\">309</span>例，占<span lang=\"EN-US\">53%</span>，新泽西州有<span lang=\"EN-US\">104</span>例。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">据英国《泰晤士报》报道，在芝加哥的一些养老院中，一半住户的耳念珠菌检测结果为阳性。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">在欧洲，耳念珠菌曾在英国、西班牙、挪威和德国检出。<span lang=\"EN-US\">2013</span>年到<span lang=\"EN-US\">2017</span>年，欧洲疾病控制和预防中心（<span lang=\"EN-US\">ECDC</span>）报告了来自几个国家的<span lang=\"EN-US\">620</span>个欧洲耳念珠菌病例。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;\r\nmso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">最大的一次感染暴发发生于<span lang=\"EN-US\">2015</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">4</span>月至<span lang=\"EN-US\">2016</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">11</span>月期间，地点在伦敦的一家心胸外科<span lang=\"EN-US\">ICU</span>，涉及<span lang=\"EN-US\">72</span>位患者。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%\">2016</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%\">年<span lang=\"EN-US\">6</span>月英国曾发出警报，牛津大学附属医院<span lang=\"EN-US\">NHS</span>信托基金组织的一项回顾性调查中发现在<span lang=\"EN-US\">2015</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">2</span>月<span lang=\"EN-US\">2</span>日至<span lang=\"EN-US\">2016</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">10</span>月<span lang=\"EN-US\">16</span>日期间，有<span lang=\"EN-US\">4</span>位耳念珠菌定植患者和<span lang=\"EN-US\">5</span>位感染患者。这<span lang=\"EN-US\">9</span>位患者中，<span lang=\"EN-US\">8</span>位在诊断前曾入住神经科<span lang=\"EN-US\">ICU</span>。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">由于目前新型抗真菌的药物研发尚无令人鼓舞的进展，所以一般患者的死亡率可达<span lang=\"EN-US\">50%</span>，脑脊液感染患者的死亡率可能高达<span lang=\"EN-US\">72%</span>。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:200%\">\r\n		<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%; font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">权威观点：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:#333333;\r\nbackground:white;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">美国<span lang=\"EN-US\">CDC</span>认为，耳念珠菌会给全球健康都带来严重威胁。基于以下三点要密切关注这一真菌：</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:#333333;background:\r\nwhite\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\">具有多重抗药性。耳念珠菌对一些常用于念珠菌感染的抗真菌药有抗药性。</span><br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <o:OfficeDocumentSettings>\r\n 3\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"46\"\r\n   Name=\"List Table 1 Light Accent 4\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"47\" Name=\"List Table 2 Accent 4\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"48\" Name=\"List Table 3 Accent 4\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"49\" Name=\"List Table 4 Accent 4\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Name=\"List Table 6 Colorful Accent 5\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"52\"\r\n   Name=\"List Table 7 Colorful Accent 5\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"46\"\r\n   Name=\"List Table 1 Light Accent 6\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"47\" Name=\"List Table 2 Accent 6\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"48\" Name=\"List Table 3 Accent 6\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"49\" Name=\"List Table 4 Accent 6\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"50\" Name=\"List Table 5 Dark Accent 6\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"51\"\r\n   Name=\"List Table 6 Colorful Accent 6\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"52\"\r\n   Name=\"List Table 7 Colorful Accent 6\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" SemiHidden=\"true\" UnhideWhenUsed=\"true\"\r\n   Name=\"Mention\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" SemiHidden=\"true\" UnhideWhenUsed=\"true\"\r\n   Name=\"Smart Hyperlink\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" SemiHidden=\"true\" UnhideWhenUsed=\"true\"\r\n   Name=\"Hashtag\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" SemiHidden=\"true\" UnhideWhenUsed=\"true\"\r\n   Name=\"Unresolved Mention\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" SemiHidden=\"true\" UnhideWhenUsed=\"true\"\r\n   Name=\"Smart Link\"/>\r\n </w:LatentStyles>\r\n</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 10]>\r\n<style>\r\n /* Style Definitions */\r\n table.MsoNormalTable\r\n	{mso-style-name:普通表格;\r\n	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;\r\n	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;\r\n	mso-style-noshow:yes;\r\n	mso-style-priority:99;\r\n	mso-style-parent:\"\";\r\n	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;\r\n	mso-para-margin:0cm;\r\n	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;\r\n	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\n	font-size:10.5pt;\r\n	font-family:宋体;\r\n	letter-spacing:-.25pt;}\r\n</style>\r\n<![endif]--></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-left:11.55pt;text-indent:-11.55pt;mso-char-indent-count:\r\n-1.0;line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:\r\n150%;color:#333333;background:white\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 2. </span><span style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:#333333;background:white\">难以通过标准实验方法鉴定。只有通过实验室的特殊技术才能鉴别耳念珠菌，而错误的鉴别结果则会导致错误的治疗方法。</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-left:11.55pt;text-indent:-11.55pt;mso-char-indent-count:\r\n-1.0;line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:\r\n150%;color:#333333;background:white\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3. </span><span style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:#333333;background:white\">耳念珠菌已经引发了大规模感染。因此，快速鉴别出耳念珠菌并进行特殊隔离治疗才能有效防止其进一步传播。</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt\">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">所以，高效、快速和准确的临床检测手段是关键，而联合用药仍是目前主要方案。耳念珠菌的最佳治疗方法尚未确定，棘白菌素是一线治疗药物，可与伏立康唑联合，二者似乎具有协同作用。在治疗无反应的情况下应给予两性霉素<span lang=\"EN-US\">B</span>，如与其他抗真菌剂（例如，棘白菌素）联合应用，则不排除协同效应。然而，由于在治疗期间可能产生耐药性，因此必须予定期药敏试验以确认治疗有效性。较新的唑类（例如泊沙康唑和艾沙康唑）已显示对耳念珠菌具有良好的体外活性。</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt\">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:200%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; line-height: 200%; font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">实验室的检测方法：</span></b></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%\">以往的研究表明，血液、尿液、呼吸道和脑脊液等样本中都可以分离出耳念珠菌。但是，由于耳念珠菌在表型上与其他致病的念珠菌难以区分，特别是希木龙假丝酵母菌等，它们同属于希木龙假丝酵母菌复合群<span lang=\"EN-US\">(Candida haemulonii complex)</span>，</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">这是包括了<span lang=\"EN-US\">Candida auris</span>，<span lang=\"EN-US\">Candida duobushaemulonii</span>和<span lang=\"EN-US\">Candida haemulonii</span>在内的一类酵母菌，他们在生化反应表型上十分相似。这使得实验室中常用的显色培养基、生化检测（<span lang=\"EN-US\">API</span>）或者<span lang=\"EN-US\">VITEK2</span>等自动检测仪等，均不能有效准确的检测出该类细菌，亦或错误地判定为其它类型的念珠菌。例如，哥伦比亚卡塔赫纳市<span lang=\"EN-US\">2016</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">8</span>月，在儿童重症监护室中检测到<span lang=\"EN-US\">5</span>例耳道念珠菌感染病例，这些分离珠最初被鉴定为白念珠菌和红酵母菌，但最终证实为耳念珠菌；我国已知<span lang=\"EN-US\">18</span>例感染者中，<span lang=\"EN-US\">15</span>例在中国医科大学附属第一医院被发现，初期患者临床标本被分离出<span lang=\"EN-US\">35</span>株希木龙假丝酵母菌，进一步检测后才发现是耳念珠菌。事实上，因常规诊断经常错误识别，耳念珠菌感染的真实流行状况仍然是未知的；所以，高效准确地鉴定耳念珠菌是临床治疗和有效控制该类感染的关键。目前，欧美国家常用的实验室检测方法主要有<span lang=\"EN-US\">:</span></span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%\">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:black;background:white\">1. 基于辅助激光解析电离飞行时间质谱仪（</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif;\r\ncolor:black;background:white\">MALDI-TOF</span><span style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:black;background:white\">）的检测方法。<span lang=\"EN-US\">&nbsp;</span></span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%\">2018</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%\">年<span lang=\"EN-US\">4</span>月美国<span lang=\"EN-US\">FDA</span>批准了首个鉴定耳念珠菌方法&mdash;&mdash;</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">Bruker MALDI Biotyper CA</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%\">系统。</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">Bruker MALDI Biotyper CA</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%\">系统采用</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">MALDI-TOF</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%\">质谱与微生物数据库相结合的技术。用患者样本培养的菌落，经过</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">MALDI-TOF</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%\">质谱仪测定，获得微生物独特的质谱图，与数据库里的谱峰比对，最终得到种水平可靠的鉴定结果。</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">Bruker MALDI Biotyper CA</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%\">系统能够可靠的、大范围地鉴定病原菌，快速鉴定引起院感爆发的病原体，提高实验室常规检测大批样本的能力，改进治疗方案和对病人的有效护理。</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%\">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:black;background:white\">2. 基于基因组测序的方法。</span></span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;text-indent:24.0pt;\r\nmso-char-indent-count:2.0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\nbackground:white\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">目前，已有的真菌基因组序列数据库促进了表型相近和系统进化相似菌类的可靠性鉴定，该方法对于人们确定和研究耳念珠菌的致病性和规律仍然不可或缺。</span></span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;text-indent:24.0pt;\r\nmso-char-indent-count:2.0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\nbackground:white\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">例</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#222222;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">如对于核糖体<span lang=\"EN-US\">RNA</span>基因（<span lang=\"EN-US\">D1 / D2</span>区域）或内部转录间隔区域（<span lang=\"EN-US\">ITS1</span>和<span lang=\"EN-US\">ITS2</span>区域）的测序，可以提供正确和可靠的耳念珠菌表征；</span><span style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;color:black;letter-spacing:\r\n0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">但测序方法仍然面对着普及、操作繁琐和检测效率低等问题。</span></span></p>\r\n	<br />\r\n	<br />\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 20pt; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 20pt; line-height: 150%;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<br />\r\n	<div>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">重组带状疱疹疫苗获批上市，不仅填补了国内对带状疱疹缺乏的有效预防和治疗手段的空白，也将在带状疱疹严峻的防控形势下，逐步的完善流行病学数据及正规的带状疱疹监测系统。此外，重组带状疱疹疫苗获批上市，预防带状疱疹及其并发症将减轻个人、家庭及社会的经济负担。未来，将是数千万潜在的带状疱疹病毒患者的福音。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">一、重组带状疱疹疫苗简介。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">来源：</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">葛兰素史克，简称&ldquo;<span lang=\"EN-US\">GSK</span>&rdquo;。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">英文名：</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">Herpes zoster vaccine（<span lang=\"EN-US\">recombinant</span>，<span lang=\"EN-US\">adjuvanted</span>）。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">中文名：</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">重组带状疱疹疫苗。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black;\">商品名：</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">SHINGRIX</span></b></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">在美国<span lang=\"EN-US\">CDC</span>，重组带状疱疹疫苗<span lang=\"EN-US\">(RZV, SHINGRIX)</span>自<span lang=\"EN-US\">2017</span>年开始使用，并被<span lang=\"EN-US\">ACIP</span>推荐为首选带状疱疹疫苗。</span></b></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">&nbsp;</span></b></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">用途：</span></b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">推荐用于预防<span lang=\"EN-US\">50</span>岁及以上成人带状疱疹。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51);\">根据<span lang=\"EN-US\">ACIP</span>推荐概要：<span lang=\"EN-US\"><span>&nbsp; </span></span></span></b></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">50岁及以上人士的常规疫苗注射</span></span></p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\nmso-char-indent-count:0;mso-line-height-alt:10.5pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\nmso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51);\"><span>1.<span style=\"font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size-adjust: none; font-kerning: auto; font-language-override: normal; font-feature-settings: normal;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">不管他们之前是否有过带状疱疹。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;\r\nmso-line-height-alt:10.5pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;\r\nbackground:white\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51);\"><span>2.<span style=\"font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size-adjust: none; font-kerning: auto; font-language-override: normal; font-feature-settings: normal;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">不管他们是否报告先前用过<span lang=\"EN-US\">Zostavax</span>（<span lang=\"EN-US\">PS</span>：国内没有，<span lang=\"EN-US\">SHINGRIX</span>是首家进口注册的带状疱疹疫苗）。</span></span></p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\nmso-char-indent-count:0;mso-line-height-alt:10.5pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\nmso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51);\"><span>3.<span style=\"font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size-adjust: none; font-kerning: auto; font-language-override: normal; font-feature-settings: normal;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">患有慢性疾病<span lang=\"EN-US\">(</span>如慢性肾功能衰竭、糖尿病、类风湿关节炎、慢性肺病<span lang=\"EN-US\">)</span>的人士<span lang=\"EN-US\">; </span>除非有禁忌症或预防措施。</span></span></p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\nmso-char-indent-count:0;mso-line-height-alt:10.5pt;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\nmso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51);\"><span>4.<span style=\"font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; line-height: normal; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size-adjust: none; font-kerning: auto; font-language-override: normal; font-feature-settings: normal;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">与<span lang=\"EN-US\">Zostavax</span>类似，<span lang=\"EN-US\">SHINGRIX</span>可能用于正在接受低剂量免疫抑制治疗的成年人：预备做免疫抑制或已从一种免疫损害疾病中康复。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">使用范围：</span></b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\"><span> </span></span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:24.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">主要用于：预防<span lang=\"EN-US\">50</span>岁及以上成人带状疱疹。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">SHINGRIX</span><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">不用于</span></b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: black; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">预防原发性水痘感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">(</span>水痘<span lang=\"EN-US\">)</span>。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: red; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">&nbsp;</span></b></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">剂量和用法：</span></b></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">只适用于<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\">肌肉注射</b>，<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\">共两剂</b>，<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\">每剂<span lang=\"EN-US\">0.5 mL</span></b>，使用单独的无菌针和无菌注射器。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">肌肉注射的首选部位是<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\">上臂三角肌区</b>。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\"><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">第一剂：<span lang=\"EN-US\">0</span>个月</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">第二剂：<span lang=\"EN-US\">2</span>至<span lang=\"EN-US\">6</span>月任何时间内</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif;\">剂型与规格：</span></b></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:21.0pt\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">SHINGRIX是一种注射用的悬浮液，以单剂量小瓶的冻干<span lang=\"EN-US\">gE</span>抗原组分提供，与配套的小瓶<span lang=\"EN-US\">AS01B</span>佐剂悬浮液组分进行重组。重组后的单次剂量为<span lang=\"EN-US\">0.5 mL</span>。</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt; text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/190529/1-1Z52916040B93.png\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 352px;\" /></span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;微软雅黑&quot;, sans-serif; color: rgb(46, 48, 51); background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">重组疫苗应为乳白色、无色至淡棕色液体。在给药前检查颗粒物质和变色情况。如果存在上述任何一种情况，就不应接种疫苗。<br />\r\n	&nbsp;<br />\r\n	重组后立即使用SHINGRIX，或将SHINGRIX置于2&deg;C至8&deg;C(36&deg;F至46&deg;F)之间冷藏，6小时内使用。如在6小时内未使用重组疫苗，请弃用。<br />\r\n	&nbsp;<br />\r\n	<strong>SHINGRIX</strong><strong>不应用于:</strong></span></span></p>\r\n<ol>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">不要给任何有严重过敏反应史(如过敏反应)的人使用SHINGRIX疫苗的任何成分或在之前使用SHINGRIX过敏(见说明)。</span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><strong>已知对水痘呈血清阴性的人。</strong></span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">带状疱疹急性发作的人，SHINGRIX不能治疗带状疱疹或带状疱疹后神经痛(PHN)。任何疫苗的一般指导方针都是等到疾病的急性期结束，症状减轻后再接种。</span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">目前正在怀孕或哺乳。怀孕或哺乳的妇女应该等待SHINGRIX。</span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">接种前24小时接受特定的抗病毒药物(阿昔洛韦、泛昔洛韦或伐昔洛韦)(接种后14天避免使用这些抗病毒药物)</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">&nbsp;<br />\r\n<strong>不良反应：</strong><br />\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 在50岁及以上的受试者中，局部不良反应为疼痛(78.0%)、发红(38.1%)和肿胀(25.9%)。<br />\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 在50岁及以上的受试者中征集的一般不良反应为肌痛(44.7%)、疲劳(44.5%)、头痛(37.7%)、发抖(26.8%)、发烧(20.5%)和胃肠道症状(17.3%)。<br />\r\n&nbsp;<br />\r\n<strong>SHINGRIX</strong><strong>的效果：</strong><br />\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 两剂带状疱疹可有效预防带状疱疹和带状疱疹后神经痛(PHN，带状疱疹最常见的并发症)</span><br />\r\n<ol>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">在50岁至69岁的成年人中，两剂SHINGRIX预防带状疱疹的有效率为97%</span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">在70岁及以上的成年人中，SHINGRIX的有效率为91%</span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">在50至69岁的成年人中，两剂的SHINGRIX预防PHN的效果为91%</span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">在70岁及以上的成年人中，SHINGRIX的有效率为89%。</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">在接种疫苗后的四年中，70岁及以上人群的SHINGRIX保护率仍然很高(超过85%)。随着年龄的增长，患带状疱疹和PHN的风险也会增加，因此，对带状疱疹有很强的预防是很重要的。<br />\r\n参考来源</span><br />\r\n<ol>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">FDA : <a href=\"https://www.fda.gov/media/108597/download\">Package Insert - <strong>shingrix</strong></a></span></li>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">Centers for Disease Control and prevention <a href=\"https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/vpd/index.html\">Vaccines and Preventable Diseases</a>:Shingles Vaccination</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">&nbsp;<br />\r\n&nbsp;<br />\r\n&nbsp;<br />\r\n&nbsp;<br />\r\n疑问及解答：<br />\r\n疑问一：我打过水痘疫苗，还用接种带状疱疹疫苗么？<br />\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 答：水痘疫苗只能预防水痘，不能预防带状疱疹和带状疱疹后神经痛，是需要接种带状疱疹疫苗的。<br />\r\n&nbsp;<br />\r\n疑问二：我没到50岁，还正直大好时光，也需要接种么？<br />\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 答：水痘带状疱疹病毒感染，可以表现为两种临床症状：</span><br />\r\n<ol>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">水痘，好发于儿童期；</span></li>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">带状疱疹，好发于中老年人。</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">如果您是水痘易感人群（也就是说血清学阴性），那么就不用接种带状疱疹疫苗，但需要接种水痘疫苗以预防水痘；如果你以前有得过水痘，也有必要复查下体内的抗体保护水平，在处于水痘高风险区域时，是否有足够的免疫抵抗力，预防水痘感染也是相当重要的。当然，后期可以进行预防带状疱疹疫苗。<br />\r\n疑问三：我想接种带状疱疹疫苗，可是我不知道以前是否得过水痘，且水痘呈血清学阴性又是什么？？<br />\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 答：如果不知道自己是否得过水痘，很简单，做个检测就知道了，使用德国维润赛润水痘带状疱疹病毒抗体诊断试剂，检测下IgG抗体，如果结果显示＞100mIU/mL，则表明既往有过感染，或者有接种过水痘疫苗。若是结果显示＜50mIU/mL，证明是血清学阴性，这时，您需要注意了，水痘的易感人群，需要接种水痘疫苗进行预防。<br />\r\n&nbsp;<br />\r\n疑问四：哪种试剂检测水痘血清学阴性最可靠？<br />\r\n&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 答：<strong>德国维润赛润水痘带状疱疹抗体检测试剂</strong>。据最新资料显示，目前在NMPA有注册证的水痘带状疱疹病毒检测试剂生产厂家不超过5家，IgA/IgG/IgM三个品种皆有并且能够定量检测IgG抗体的厂家仅有德国维润赛润一家！</span><br />\r\n<ol>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><strong>疫苗的有效成分均为糖蛋白抗原，而德国维润赛润恰恰使用的正是纯化VZV糖蛋白抗原，</strong>具有高灵敏度,高特异性对疫苗接种后产生的抗体检测完全匹配。</span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">是进口独家产品。</span></li>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">相对国内的诊断试剂而言，<strong>德国维润赛润的水痘带状疱疹抗体检测试剂是唯一可以定量的产品</strong>（国际公认4PL方法进行精确的定量（IgG））。</span></li>\r\n	<li align=\"left\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><strong>有效期长达18个月</strong>，比国产产品有效期长半年。</span></li>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">依据WHO标准，可溯源性。目前国产产品无法做到这一点。</span></li>\r\n	<li>\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><strong>项目齐全</strong>，具有水痘带状疱症病毒IgA/IgG/IgM 三种产品，尤其是IgA ，IgA抗体在患者潜伏感染再激活期间是明显增加，并且经常与带状疱疹发作相关。检测是最敏感的，并且很多研究表明，仅仅以IgG和IgM抗体作为带状疱疹的诊断价值有限，尚不能作为带状疱疹的特异性诊断依据，而IgA在带状疱疹组合正常对照比较中有统计学差异。国内的其他厂家只有IgM或者IgG项目，检测项目既不齐全，也不能做到定量检测。</span></li>\r\n</ol>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:20px;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <w:WordDocument>\r\n  <w:View>Normal</w:View>\r\n </w:LatentStyles>\r\n</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 10]>\r\n<style>\r\n /* Style Definitions */\r\n table.MsoNormalTable\r\n	{mso-style-name:普通表格;\r\n	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;\r\n	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;\r\n	mso-style-noshow:yes;\r\n	mso-style-priority:99;\r\n	mso-style-parent:\"\";\r\n	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;\r\n	mso-para-margin:0cm;\r\n	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;\r\n	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\n	font-size:10.5pt;\r\n	font-family:宋体;\r\n	letter-spacing:-.25pt;}\r\n</style>\r\n<![endif]-->\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">近几年来，由真菌（主要是念珠菌、隐球菌、曲霉菌和孢子菌等）感染引发的疾病越来越引起人们的重视。据统计，目前全球有近<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>亿人患有不同程度真菌引起的相关疾病，全球每年因真菌感染及其并发症导致的死亡人数或超过<span lang=\"EN-US\">160</span>万，与结核病导致的死亡人数相近。而英国政府资助的一项研究表明，如果不制定政策来减缓包括真菌等引起的耐药性的上升，到<span lang=\"EN-US\">2050</span>年，全球将有<span lang=\"EN-US\">1000</span>万人死于耐药性，超过预计将因癌症死亡的<span lang=\"EN-US\">800</span>万人。因此，真菌对目前已知的抗菌药物耐药性的增加，是当今社会要面临的一项重大问题；而像耳念珠菌这样具有多重耐药性念珠菌&mdash;&mdash;超级细菌的出现，更是全球健康要面对的一项严重挑战。<span lang=\"EN-US\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.1pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n	<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">&nbsp;</span></b></p>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left\">\r\n	<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:\r\n&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif;color:red\">流行病学特征： </span></b><b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nfont-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n	<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\"><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"mso-spacerun:yes\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">目前，已知不少于<span lang=\"EN-US\">9</span>种常见的念珠菌能引起人或动物的感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">,</span>均为条件致病菌。它们是白色念珠菌、热带念珠菌、克柔念珠菌、星形念珠菌、高里念珠菌、光滑念珠菌、近平滑念珠菌、乳酒念珠菌和耳念珠菌等。其中引起人类念珠菌病的主要是白色念珠菌，而耐药性最强的是耳念珠菌。近年来由于不合理使用抗生素、肿瘤化疗、艾滋病的流行和器官移植等使念珠菌的感染机会逐年上升，念珠菌主要引起真菌败血症、泌尿系统感染和全身感染等严重疾病，在医院血液感染中列第四位，病死率列第一位，可达<span lang=\"EN-US\">40%</span>以上，在<span lang=\"EN-US\">ICU</span>中最常发生。目前，临床光滑念珠菌和耳念珠菌检出率也有明显上升趋势。</span></p>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:\r\nZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\">下面给出的是一项结合国内外典型研究的统计表，从中大致可以了解常见念珠菌的分型以及其耐药性。</span><br />\r\n<p align=\"center\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:center;line-height:150%\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><b><span style=\"font-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif;color:black;background:white\">一项念珠菌的分类占比及其耐药性的统计分析</span></b></span></p>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:\r\nZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\"><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <o:OfficeDocumentSettings>\r\n  <o:AllowPNG/>\r\n </w:LatentStyles>\r\n</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 10]>\r\n<style>\r\n /* Style Definitions */\r\n table.MsoNormalTable\r\n	{mso-style-name:普通表格;\r\n	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;\r\n	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;\r\n	mso-style-noshow:yes;\r\n	mso-style-priority:99;\r\n	mso-style-parent:\"\";\r\n	mso-padding-alt:0cm 5.4pt 0cm 5.4pt;\r\n	mso-para-margin:0cm;\r\n	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;\r\n	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;\r\n	font-size:10.5pt;\r\n	font-family:宋体;\r\n	letter-spacing:-.25pt;}\r\n</style>\r\n<![endif]--><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/190426/1-1Z4261JR1314.png\" style=\"width: 600px; height: 84px;\" /></span></div>\r\n<div class=\"*\">\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">超级病菌&mdash;&mdash;耳念珠菌是一种新出现的、多重耐药的病原体，近年来在世界范围内造成多起感染暴发，它通常发生在重症监护病房<span lang=\"EN-US\">(</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">Intensive Care Unit</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:\r\n150%\">，缩写为</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%;font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;,serif\">ICU</span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">)</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">。<span lang=\"EN-US\">2009</span>年在一位日本患者的耳道中首次检出，并于<span lang=\"EN-US\">2011</span>年在韩国造成<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>例血流感染。<span lang=\"EN-US\">2012</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>月<span lang=\"EN-US\">-2013</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">7</span>月，耳念菌首次在委内瑞拉爆发，涉及<span lang=\"EN-US\">18</span>名患者；此后全球爆发了多起耳念菌感染事件。 全基因组测序揭示了不同大陆和次大陆上真菌的遗传分离，其中包括东亚、南亚、南美和南非。自<span lang=\"EN-US\">2004</span>年以来，国际上共收集<span lang=\"EN-US\">15,271</span>种侵入性耳念珠菌的亚型，研究者从中重新鉴定了<span lang=\"EN-US\">4</span>种亚型，最终认定耳念珠菌业已成为新的严重临床问题。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left\">\r\n		<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:\r\n&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif;color:red\">主要危险人群、危险因素及危害证据：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left\">\r\n		<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nnormal\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:5.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nfont-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif;color:red\">&nbsp;</span></b></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:red;background:white\">1.</span></b><b><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:red;background:white\">主要危险人群：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\">不明原因的发烧患者；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\"> </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\">中耳炎<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>耳蜗感染患者；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span>全身感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>皮肤感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>尿路感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>手术伤口感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>心肌感染<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>脑膜炎<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>骨感染患者；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\">免疫力低下者<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>长期住院患者<span lang=\"EN-US\">/</span>养老院等群居者；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo1;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">感染者的密切接触者。</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-pagination:widow-orphan;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family:&quot;Verdana&quot;,sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-pagination:widow-orphan;background:white\">\r\n		<b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;color:red;\r\nbackground:white\">2.</span></b><b><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%;color:red;background:white\">主要危险因素包括：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">使用广谱抗菌素；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:\r\nbold\">ICU</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;\r\nmso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">停留；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\"> </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">使用中心静脉导管；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;<span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\"> </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">免疫抑制治疗；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;<span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\"> </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">使用导尿管；</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-left:21.0pt;text-align:left;\r\ntext-indent:-21.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:0;line-height:150%;mso-pagination:\r\nwidow-orphan;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;background:white\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\">&lt;&gt;</span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;font-family:Wingdings;\r\nmso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:Wingdings;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp;</span></span></span><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;\r\nfont-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\nWingdings;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt\"><span style=\"mso-list:Ignore\"><span style=\"font:7.0pt &quot;Times New Roman&quot;\">&nbsp; </span></span></span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:\r\n宋体;color:black;letter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">近期手术。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:\r\n12.0pt;line-height:150%\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<b><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:red;background:white\">3.</span></b><b><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:red;background:white\">主要危害证据：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:24.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%;mso-pagination:widow-orphan;background:white\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:black;\r\nletter-spacing:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">在我国，目前已经报告的耳念珠菌患者有<span lang=\"EN-US\">18</span>人，其中北京<span lang=\"EN-US\">3</span>人，沈阳<span lang=\"EN-US\">15</span>人，南方地区暂未发现确诊病例。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">在美国，根据美国疾控中心<span lang=\"EN-US\">CDC</span>的数据，截止到<span lang=\"EN-US\">2019</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">2</span>月底，全美耳念珠菌确诊病例有<span lang=\"EN-US\">587</span>例，其中纽约州有<span lang=\"EN-US\">309</span>例，占<span lang=\"EN-US\">53%</span>，新泽西州有<span lang=\"EN-US\">104</span>例。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">据英国《泰晤士报》报道，在芝加哥的一些养老院中，一半住户的耳念珠菌检测结果为阳性。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">在欧洲，耳念珠菌曾在英国、西班牙、挪威和德国检出。<span lang=\"EN-US\">2013</span>年到<span lang=\"EN-US\">2017</span>年，欧洲疾病控制和预防中心（<span lang=\"EN-US\">ECDC</span>）报告了来自几个国家的<span lang=\"EN-US\">620</span>个欧洲耳念珠菌病例。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;\r\nmso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;line-height:150%\">最大的一次感染暴发发生于<span lang=\"EN-US\">2015</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">4</span>月至<span lang=\"EN-US\">2016</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">11</span>月期间，地点在伦敦的一家心胸外科<span lang=\"EN-US\">ICU</span>，涉及<span lang=\"EN-US\">72</span>位患者。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%\">2016</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:150%\">年<span lang=\"EN-US\">6</span>月英国曾发出警报，牛津大学附属医院<span lang=\"EN-US\">NHS</span>信托基金组织的一项回顾性调查中发现在<span lang=\"EN-US\">2015</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">2</span>月<span lang=\"EN-US\">2</span>日至<span lang=\"EN-US\">2016</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">10</span>月<span lang=\"EN-US\">16</span>日期间，有<span lang=\"EN-US\">4</span>位耳念珠菌定植患者和<span lang=\"EN-US\">5</span>位感染患者。这<span lang=\"EN-US\">9</span>位患者中，<span lang=\"EN-US\">8</span>位在诊断前曾入住神经科<span lang=\"EN-US\">ICU</span>。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;\r\nline-height:150%\">由于目前新型抗真菌的药物研发尚无令人鼓舞的进展，所以一般患者的死亡率可达<span lang=\"EN-US\">50%</span>，脑脊液感染患者的死亡率可能高达<span lang=\"EN-US\">72%</span>。</span></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt\">&nbsp;</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:200%\">\r\n		<b style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:\r\n10.5pt;line-height:200%;font-family:&quot;微软雅黑&quot;,sans-serif;color:red\">权威观点：</span></b></p>\r\n	<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent:23.0pt;mso-char-indent-count:2.0;\r\nline-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:#333333;\r\nbackground:white;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold\">美国<span lang=\"EN-US\">CDC</span>认为，耳念珠菌会给全球健康都带来严重威胁。基于以下三点要密切关注这一真菌：</span></p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;color:#333333;background:\r\nwhite\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 1.</span><span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\">具有多重抗药性。耳念珠菌对一些常用于念珠菌感染的抗真菌药有抗药性。</span><br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;line-height:150%\">\r\n		<span style=\"font-size:12.0pt;line-height:150%;\r\ncolor:#333333;background:white\"><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <o:OfficeDocumentSettings>\r\n <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"48\" Name=\"List Table 3 Accent 4\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException Locked=\"false\" Priority=\"49\" Name=\"List Table 4 Accent 4\"/>\r\n  <w:LsdException
